plugin_index.title: 1px Expansion
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Expands areas of color by one pixel. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: 2D-ImageFilter Library
plugin_index.author: Hawkynt
plugin_index.desc: Library of algorithms used in various emulators (VirtualGB, Mame, DOSBox, SNES9x, ZSNES, etc,). Also known as Pixel Art Scaling Plugin.

plugin_index.title: 3D Heightmap v1.0
plugin_index.author: Spikehead777
plugin_index.desc: Two plugins which take current image as a height map & shines a light on it, returning the intensity of reflected rays as another image (similar to Emboss).

plugin_index.title: 3D Object (BETA)
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Wrap the canvas around a box, torus or topographical graph (with custom equation). Preview is used to drag and rotate shape. Found in Evan's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Aardvark Tiling Effect
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Tiles an image with choices for reflected and brick tiling, rotation and perspective distortions

plugin_index.title: AA's Assistant
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Used to soften the edges of an object in order to blend it with a background. Object must be surrounded by transparent pixels to find the edges.

plugin_index.title: Add Depth
plugin_index.author: maccas
plugin_index.desc: Two plugins which add (the appearance of) depth to a 2D shape on a transparent layer. Add Depth adds an apparent thickness by adding a 'trail'. Offset Shadow is a displacement plugin for moving a shadow after it's been created.

plugin_index.title: Add Noise +
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Adds digital 'noise' to a selection. Included in the native 'Add Noise' effect. Note: forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: Add/Remove/Recover Watermark
plugin_index.author: Evan Wallace
plugin_index.desc: Removed by author due to possible copyright abuses. Note: forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: Advanced Color Replacement
plugin_index.author: silverhammer
plugin_index.desc: Recolors every pixel a different amount based on how similar it is to the secondary color. Also known as Advanced Recoloring.

plugin_index.title: Advanced Greyscale
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Desaturates an image to grayscale. RGB channel bias is individually configurable. Found in Illnab1024's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Advanced Rotate
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Rotate an image or selection from the center with options on how the devoid pixels will be treated (clamp, wrap, mirror, Primary Color, Secondary color, untouched). Found in Stu's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Ahmed's Plugins
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Apply Color, Cartoonize, Color Switch, Clarifaction+, InkSketch+, Posterize+, Quick Gravity & Vibration

plugin_index.title: Alias
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Removes antialiasing. Useful prior to feathering. Found in Mike Ryan's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Align Object
plugin_index.author: moc426
plugin_index.desc: Align an object on a transparent layer to the corners, sides or center of the layer or selection. A newer version with it's own submenu is available as part of KrisVDM's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Align Object
plugin_index.author: xod
plugin_index.desc: Align an object within the layer. Options to align vertically (Top, Center & Bottom) and horizontally (Left, Center & Right), or both simultaneously.

plugin_index.title: Alivate Batch File Processor
plugin_index.author: merarischroeder
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Iterates through a given folder, opening each image with paint.net and applying a ScriptLab script before saving the image again. Requires ScriptLab be installed.

plugin_index.title: Alpha 32-bit Bitmap
plugin_index.author: FremyCompany
plugin_index.desc: Allows you to open and save file in 32-bit bitmap. You must rename the file to *.bmpx (to avoid conflict with the existing PDN's BMP handler). If you try to open non-BMP files, you should receive an error (24bpp bitmaps are loaded correctly)

plugin_index.title: Alpha Blur v2
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Updated version of Alpha Blur, this effect performs a Gaussian blur on alpha channel (transparency). Useful for fading / blending irregular shapes. V2 has enhanced performance & option to shift blur. Found in Tanel's Photo and Color Plugins

plugin_index.title: Alpha Contrast
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Blur or sharpen the Alpha channel. Found in Stu's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Alpha Levels
plugin_index.author: redflux
plugin_index.desc: Like posterize but for alpha channel. Limits the amount of steps in the alpha channel.

plugin_index.title: Alpha map
plugin_index.author: Boude
plugin_index.desc: Convert color to transparency & vice versa.

plugin_index.title: Alpha Mask
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Turn an image into an alpha mask. If the image has color, it is converted to greyscale. Updated to add clipboard functionality. Found in Illnab1024's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Alpha Mask Import (2.0)
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Turn an image into an alpha mask. If the image has color, it is converted to greyscale. Updated to add clipboard functionality. Appears to be a later version than the one contained in Illnab1024's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Alpha to 0
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Set the alpha channel to zero (transparent). Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Alpha to 255
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Set the alpha channel to 255 (opaque). Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Alpha to Dots
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Resets alpha values in the image to 0 or 255, based on the original alpha value. The result is a 'dotty' transition instead of a blended one (imagine old newspaper images)

plugin_index.title: Alpha Transform 1.1
plugin_index.author: DW-dev
plugin_index.desc: Pixels below the lower limit get alpha set to 0 (fully transparent). Pixels above the upper limit get alpha set to 255 (fully opaque). Pixels in between get alpha between 0 and 255 depending on their brightness.

plugin_index.title: Alpha Transform v1.0
plugin_index.author: DW.dev
plugin_index.desc: Superseded by a later release: See Alpha Transform 1.1

plugin_index.title: Alphalizer
plugin_index.author: Rider01
plugin_index.desc: Changes the image's alpha channel based on the original pixel colors, modified using the selected method.

plugin_index.title: AlphaMask Brush v1.7
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Draw an alpha mask directly onto an image. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: AlphaSpace
plugin_index.author: MaR-V-iN
plugin_index.desc: Converts a white/black background into transparency. Recognizes shadows and makes them semi-transparent.

plugin_index.title: Alpha-Threshold
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Allows manipulation of transparency (Alpha) in a layer which already has a range of alpha values. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Alt to LayerSaver
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Saves layers as individual files in PNG, BMP, GIF or JPEG format. Released as Zip Archive Filetype

plugin_index.title: AmigaIcon
plugin_index.author: Connect 9600
plugin_index.desc: Load and save Amiga (.info) files. To use, copy AmigaIcon.dll and AmigaIcon.palettes to the paint.net FileTypes folder.

plugin_index.title: Anaglyphs
plugin_index.author: Itso
plugin_index.desc: Creations of anaglyphs (3D stereo pictures).

plugin_index.title: Angled Gradient
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Draws a gradient in the active layer / selection at the specified angle

plugin_index.title: Animal Texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates textures which look like faux animal skins. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Animated Image 1.7
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Open and save animated GIFs & PNGs, one frame into each layer. Found in Simon Brown's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Animation Helper v0.81
plugin_index.author: recursor
plugin_index.desc: Allows you to view any sequence of animations within a sprite sheet.

plugin_index.title: Another Raw File Loader
plugin_index.author: Telesto
plugin_index.desc: Support for loading RAW files. No longer supported or available for download.

plugin_index.title: Anti-alias v1.5
plugin_index.author: jsonchiu
plugin_index.desc: Use to smooth edges, keeping them clear, not blurred.

plugin_index.title: Apply Color
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Apply a filter to recolor or tint an image. Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Apply Texture
plugin_index.author: niwax
plugin_index.desc: Applies a texture to any selected object, saving the brightness.

plugin_index.title: Arduino NeoPixel Sketch Exporter
plugin_index.author: Makuna
plugin_index.desc: Export an image to a .h file that can be included into Arduino Sketch. The image is exported as a PROGMEM data structure for use with the NeoPixelBus Arduino library.

plugin_index.title: ArgusMagnus' Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: ArgusMagnus
plugin_index.desc: ArgusMagnus' plugin pack: Unblend, Fast Fourier Transform (FFT/IFFT), High/Low/Band Pass Filter, Edge Detect+, Barcode & App Icon Set

plugin_index.title: Arrow
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Effect is now included in paint.net from version 3.07+

plugin_index.title: ArtyThing

plugin_index.title: ASCII Art
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete, use: Another ASCII Art File Type Plugin.

plugin_index.title: ASCII Art File Type Plugin
plugin_index.author: I Like Pi
plugin_index.desc: ASCII art generator. Transform your image into an ascii art masterpiece!

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_PS Mega

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_Quadro disorter B
plugin_index.author: Asmageddon Prince
plugin_index.desc: Breaks image into sharp pieces and scatters them. Found in Asmageddon Tools Pack

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_Render-Border
plugin_index.author: Asmageddon Prince
plugin_index.desc: Renders a strange Primary colored border not unlike a raindrop covered window. Found in Asmageddon Tools Pack

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_Render-Quadro bumperoo
plugin_index.author: Asmageddon Prince

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_Render-Quadro inverto
plugin_index.author: Asmageddon Prince
plugin_index.desc: More greyscale distortion/patterning effects. Reminiscent of Sierpinksi triangles. Found in Asmageddon Tools Pack

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_Render-Quadro sharper
plugin_index.author: Asmageddon Prince
plugin_index.desc: Still more greyscale distortion/patterning effects. Found in Asmageddon Tools Pack

plugin_index.title: Asmageddon_RGB tricks
plugin_index.author: Asmageddon Prince

Subsequent grains are distance checked with other grains to obtain the maximum radius possible without overlaying any other grain. All grains could be contiguous. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack

plugin_index.title: AutoChroma
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Generates fill or unfilled circles. Has preview issues. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Autochrome Noise
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Autochrome is a technique to recolor photos using colored grain or noise. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Average Blur
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Blur which averages all pixels within a certain radius. Each pixel counts as much as any other. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Average Color (HSL)
plugin_index.author: Neil Cassidy
plugin_index.desc: Averages the color of a selection with regard to human perception of color.

plugin_index.title: Average Color of Selection

plugin_index.title: Barcode Plugin
plugin_index.author: eladkarako
plugin_index.desc: Recompiled version of the original Barcode plugin. This generate barcodes from user input. Supports Code 39, Code 39 Mod 43, Full ascii code 39 and Postnet.

plugin_index.title: Barcode Plugin

plugin_index.title: Bars

plugin_index.author: Rick Brewster

plugin_index.desc: Effect calculates a line through your photograph with the least amount of changes and deletes that line shifting all pixels over to fill the gap. This is often called 'content aware resizing'.

plugin_index.title: Border / Stroke Effect
plugin_index.author: moc426
plugin_index.desc: Draw a border around image or selection with your primary color.

plugin_index.title: Borders N' Shapes v1.6
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Draws a variety of borders and shapes. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: BoxFitting
plugin_index.author: NomBot
plugin_index.desc: Recomposes an image by reassembling it from squares in many sizes which take their color from the original image.

plugin_index.title: Bricks
plugin_index.author: jchunn
plugin_index.desc: Creates brick patterns with mortar. Found in Jesse Chunn Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Brightness/ Darkness to Alpha
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Turns Brightness (or Darkness) into pure transparent goodness! Found in Mike Ryan's Plugins. Topic is locked by request: use Color to Alpha instead.

plugin_index.title: Brush Factory
plugin_index.author: Joshua Lamusga
plugin_index.desc: Import and use dynamic brushes with custom shapes as drawing tools. Imagine the paint brush with different tips available at your selection. Use it to create textures, or stamp out objects like grass, trees and buildings. It can be used like a spray can or be used to draw symmetrically.

plugin_index.title: Brush Filter beta v1.0
plugin_index.author: Joshua Lamusga
plugin_index.desc: Apply paint.net Adjustments and Effects with a brush. Select an effect, a brush, brush behavior and draw to apply the effect (imagine painting where the strokes reveal the filtered image). Supports dynamic brushes and custom brushes.

plugin_index.title: Bullet
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: No longer supported: renders bullet holes in your image.

plugin_index.title: Bulletin Board Trim
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Surrounds the image with an edging selected from a number of patterns, spacing & color. Found in toe_head2001's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Buttons
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Create beautiful colored buttons with or without text & symbols. Now with border width & text AA. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: CalculPatron - book folding pattern
plugin_index.author: roro69
plugin_index.desc: Plugin to assist with the creation of book folding patterns. Output is saved to an Excel workbook. Controls are in French.

plugin_index.title: Calendar Creator
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Render a single month calendar to the canvas.

plugin_index.title: Callicolour
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Create beautiful colored ribbons by setting four control points. Many coloring options.

plugin_index.title: Camera lens distortion correction
plugin_index.author: kbarni
plugin_index.desc: Correct the barrel or pincushion distortions in digital photos. AKA Lens Distortion

plugin_index.title: CannedBrush 1.5
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Automates the process of creating repeat brush strokes for Custom Brushes plugin. Removed by author.

plugin_index.title: Cartoonize
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Applies dithering to simplify color differences and turn photos into cartoons. Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Cell Texture
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Produces a myriad of neighboring 'cells'. Hugely configurable.

plugin_index.title: CellMaker
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Renders x,y sized cells whose edges are entirely within a given selection. Use CellMaker Rev (the improved version). This legacy version can be found in EER's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: CellMaker Rev
plugin_index.author: zoonel
plugin_index.desc: Improved Cellmaker plugin with more options.

plugin_index.title: Change Extreme Colors
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Modify the color channels of the darkest or lightest colors in an image. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Channel Mask
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Similar to Alpha Mask but has more control over which channels to apply the mask to, and which channels to create the mask from. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: Channel Mixer Greyscale
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Mix the Red, Green, and Blue channels separately as you convert an image to greyscale. Also known as Advanced Greyscale. Found in Illnab1024's Plugins.

plugin_index.title: Channel Operations
plugin_index.author: Joshua Lamusga
plugin_index.desc: Perform a number of operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, division etc, on a selected red, green, blue, hue, saturation, value, or alpha channel (or rgb or hsv all at once). Channel swapping is also supported.

plugin_index.title: Channels v2.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Modify colors by channel (Red, Green Blue & Alpha). Formerly InvertColours+. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Chart White Balance
plugin_index.author: yvdh
plugin_index.desc: Adjust the white balance of a picture based on the white and black patch a standard color chart in the scene.

plugin_index.title: Checkboard
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Draws a checkerboard pattern similar to the one used by paint.net to show transparency.

plugin_index.title: ChessFEN
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Draws chessboard and position from scratch or by parsing a FEN string. Requires the Chess Merida font be installed. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Chop Up and Save
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Chop the current layer into tiles and save them to individual files in a range of formats (including option to ZIP). Four files are required: 2 in /Effects and 2 in the paint.net installation folder.
plugin_index.dlls: ChopUp.dll & ChopUp.dlc (/Effects).  OptionBasedLibrary vY.Y.dll  & OptionBasedLibrary vY.Y.dlc (paint.net installation folder)

plugin_index.title: Chroma Key (Green)
plugin_index.author: tarheit
plugin_index.desc: For removing the green background from an image. Updated to include Blue.

plugin_index.title: Chroma Key/Green Screen
plugin_index.author: mgeorgiady
plugin_index.desc: Pair of plugins which allow for the removal of solid backgrounds from images. Simple Green Screen works with green or blue backgrounds, Simple Chroma Key with any color background.

plugin_index.title: Circle Fractal
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Creates a circular fractal similar to a stylized snowflake. See post #16 in the thread for 3.5x version.

plugin_index.title: Circle Text
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Writes text into a circle, or on an angle. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Circular Text
plugin_index.author: xod
plugin_index.desc: Render text as if it was printed in a circle of constant radius.

plugin_index.title: Clarifaction+
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Enhance detail in a photograph by adjusting the detail and saturation. Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: ClipDisplace
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Uses the tone of an image held in the clipboard to distort the current layer.

plugin_index.title: Clipwarp
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Deforms a clipboard image 'around' an object. Useful for creating glass and metallic effects.

plugin_index.title: ClipWarpNew
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: A new version of the Clipwarp plugin (this has a simpler interface). Use it to mimic glass, create metallic distortions. Has smoothing and some fun colouring options.

plugin_index.title: Clock Plugin
plugin_index.author: xod
plugin_index.desc: Render a circular clock face. Many configurable options in very tall dialog.

plugin_index.title: Clouds Plugin
plugin_index.author: Sepcot
plugin_index.desc: Creates cloud like effects using the Perlin Noise routine.

plugin_index.title: Cluster Clear
plugin_index.author: The Number e
plugin_index.desc: An effect used to get rid of random ink blots on scanned pages. There are two modes; one builds clusters of pixels outside tolerance of the secondary color, the other builds clusters of pixels within tolerance of the primary color. If the cluster is within the size threshold, it is painted over with the secondary color.

plugin_index.title: CMY Ghost
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Distorts the colors in a similar manner to Adjustments > Invert Colors, or the Psychocolor or Psychedelic plugins. Options include tweaking the colors with respect to Cyan, Magenta, Yellow and Alpha.

plugin_index.title: Cobweb
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Randomly renders tangents to the 'tone gradient' in the layer/selection. Best applied to an image with smooth tone gradients (i.e. use a low radius blur first).

plugin_index.title: CodeLab in Russian
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: CodeLab v1.8 (paint.net 3.5.11) and v2.22 (paint.net 4.0.6+) recompiled in Russian.

plugin_index.title: CodeLab v4.1
plugin_index.author: Tom Jackson
plugin_index.desc: Internal tool for creating your own plugins. Developed by [member=BoltBait] and [member=toe_head2001]. Version 3.5 released February 25 2018. Extensive documentation is available online. A Russian language version of CodeLab is made available by [member=ReMake], see http://forums.getpaint.net/index.php?/topic/29995-codelab-in-russian

plugin_index.title: Color Aberration
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Allows you to move separately RGB channels in % or in pixels. It could be a used to create 3D pictures. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Color Accent
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Retint an image towards greyscale using the specified hue to control the recoloring. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Color Balance
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Easy color correcting or tinting effect.

plugin_index.title: Color Balance MIX
plugin_index.author: DeathStar
plugin_index.desc: Add more color or darken/lighten the image.

plugin_index.title: Color Balance+
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Enhanced color balance with Highlight, Shadow & Mid Tonal adjustments. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Color Channel Mixer
plugin_index.author: SeriousSam
plugin_index.desc: RGBA channel mixer with addition and scaling.

plugin_index.title: Color Clearer
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Makes the target color to transparent and alters remaining colors to remove the target color so that Normal Blending a layer filled with the target color reproduces the original image. For 3.5.11 compatible version see post #7 in the thread.

plugin_index.title: Color Count
plugin_index.author: stuff_gnome
plugin_index.desc: Counts the number of colors (or number of times a color is used) in an image.

plugin_index.title: Color Cut
plugin_index.author: DataDink
plugin_index.desc: Removes the secondary color to create a cut out with blended, non-jagged edges. Color Threshold alters the color, Shade Threshold alters shade and Alpha Falloff controls the 'hardness' of the effect.

plugin_index.title: Color Dimmer
plugin_index.author: Xhin
plugin_index.desc: Dims the individual RGB channels.

plugin_index.title: Color Filter
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Apply a colored filter with options to configure Hue, Density and Preserve Highlights. Found in Ed Harvey Effects v3.5

plugin_index.title: Color Flip/Rotate
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Quickly apply a color change to the image by clicking on one of many recolored thumbnails. Also known as Color Channel Flip/Rotate. Found in Ed Harvey Effects v3.5

plugin_index.title: Color Harmonies
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Easily create harmonious palettes or variants derived from a base color.

plugin_index.title: Color inpainting v1.0
plugin_index.author: zarathoustra
plugin_index.desc: Colors gray areas in a picture where colors are only known in few parts of the picture.

plugin_index.title: Color Match v1.0
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Uses an existing image as a color template to recolor your image. Works best on photos. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Color Matrix
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Transform pixels under selection in the active layer using a transformation matrix to manipulate the individual RGBA channels. Many predefined matrices are included as well as the ability to save your own.
plugin_index.dlls: ColorMatrix.Effect.dll & ColorMatrix.Effect.dlc (/Effects/), OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dll  & OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dlc (/paint.net)

plugin_index.title: Color Mixer v1.2
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Make fine color adjustments with values for Red, Yellow, Green, Cyan, Blue, Magenta & Base. Selectively apply to shadows, midtones or highlights. Found in Tanel's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Color Modulo
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates a highly colored and configurable banded multiple gradient. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Color Modulo texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Originally a tool created to find out how a picture is distorted/transformed by over effects (useful with Shape 3D). Uses the color channels to create a variation (modulo) from the ranges of the sliders (mini  maxi). Red is a modulo on the x-axis, green is on the y-axis, blue is oblique. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack

plugin_index.title: Color Range effect
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: This plugin allows you to create a mask by isolating a color subset of the original image. Colors outside of the target range will be set to transparent. Useful for selecting objects in the image by color. Also available in Russian. Based in part on the Color Target plugin by rwp80.

plugin_index.title: Color Replace
plugin_index.author: jchunn
plugin_index.desc: Color filter with the ability to fine tune the color and alpha channels.

plugin_index.title: Color Replacer
plugin_index.author: Joshua Lamusga
plugin_index.desc: Convert all pixels in the current selection from one color to another. For a pdn 3.5 compatible version see post #13.

plugin_index.title: Color Sketch
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Reinterprets an image as if it had been sketched with color pencils. Plugin is the result of a full CodeLab tutorial. Available in Russian.

plugin_index.title: Color Stretch
plugin_index.author: rwp80
plugin_index.desc: Color Stretch v1.0 stretch color values of pixels within specified threshold limits. Found in Color Target Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Color Target
plugin_index.author: rwp80
plugin_index.desc: Color Target v1.3 retains pixels of a similar color and brightness, all other pixels are made transparent. Found in Color Target Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Color Target Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: rwp80
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Color Target, Color Stretch & Target Panel

plugin_index.title: Color Tint
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Apply a color tint to the image. Options: Hue & Tint amount. Found in Ed Harvey Effects v3.5

plugin_index.title: Color to Alpha Advanced (PR1)
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Adjust the alpha level of your selected color while similar colors are adjusted as well. Has known bugs. Alternative: Tanel's Color to Alpha

plugin_index.title: Color to Alpha v2.2
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Extracts a color range from image, by leaving pixels of selected color opaque and making the rest transparent. Only alpha values are altered, color remains intact. Found in Tanel's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Color Trimming
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Used for color correction in photographs when too much of a particular color is present. Removes a defined range of a particular color allowing for more vibrant colors to be displayed. Found in Mike Ryan's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Color Zoom Blur
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Based on the zoom blur effect, but you are able to handle the color channels separately. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: ColorExchange
plugin_index.author: metobi
plugin_index.desc: Exchange one color channel for another.

plugin_index.title: Colour Chop
plugin_index.author: n d
plugin_index.desc: Similar to other colour cutting effects, but this creates a smoother transition from transparent <-> opaque

plugin_index.title: Colour Distort
plugin_index.author: Anaco
plugin_index.desc: Subtracts the red blue green by x+y or x-y or x*y depending on the option you select and then divides it by the amount you specified.

plugin_index.title: Colourblind Simulation
plugin_index.author: n d
plugin_index.desc: Ensure your image is legible for colour blind.

plugin_index.title: Combined Photo Adjustments
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Combines a number of photo adjustments (like Noise Reduction, Brightness/Contrast, Hue, Saturation) within one handy to use effect.

plugin_index.title: Compo Grids
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Renders a range of geometrical grids as an optical aid in design and proportion.

plugin_index.title: Composition tool
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Tool to help with cropping/rotating of photos (i.e. composition grids to help line up important features). Also has configurable aspect ratio with a range of preset sizes. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Conditional Effects
plugin_index.author: cookies
plugin_index.desc: Gives you the ability to run 6 effects, in the order, and only affect the colors matching the set conditions.

plugin_index.title: Conditional Hue/Saturation
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Adjust hue and saturation by setting range and conditions. Found in Evan's Effects v1.1.

plugin_index.title: ConditionalPen 1.1
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Provides a brush that will only function when a pixel is within the given min/max threshold. Used to be found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack but is no longer available.

plugin_index.title: Content Aware Fill
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Replaces the contents of a selection with pixels that are the closest match sampled from areas outside the selection. Can be used to seamlessly remove elements from an image.

plugin_index.title: Contour
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Splits an image into bands based on the tone value, with a variety of colouring options. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Convolution Effect
plugin_index.author: SeriousSam
plugin_index.desc: Modifies each pixel by comparison to neighboring pixels. 3x3 matrix is fully configurable.

plugin_index.title: Convolution Filter
plugin_index.author: ArgusMagnus
plugin_index.desc: Apply a variable sized convolution filter to a selection or layer. Includes ability to save and load customized filters (click on Presets).

plugin_index.title: Coordinate Plane Points
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Writes multiple pixel coordinates onto the active layer from the center outwards. Spacing is controlled by Step value. Overlay dictiates opacity of white background. No separate topic, only found in Toe-Head2001's plugin pack.

plugin_index.title: Copy Selection Coords
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Copies the current selection coordinates to the clipboard in the format: left, top, width, height. NB plugin link is in post #3 of the thread.

plugin_index.title: Create Image-Map
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Provides an interface for constructing an HTML image map. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Cross-Processing
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Classic film effect; Increased contrast, weird color shifts & tints. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: CSV (comma separated values) Filetype
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Saves the image as a text file containing the pixel RGBA information in numeric format. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Cuboids
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Turns an image into rectangular areas with the illusion of depth. The effect is adjustable between simple pixelating and one point perspective images resembling tower blocks.

plugin_index.title: Curly Lines
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Render all kinds of curly (and straight) lines. Intimidating UI is well explained in companion PDF.

plugin_index.title: Curtis' Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Tile image, Jumble, Selective palette, Equations, Effects Lab, Fern Fractal, Channel Mask, Displacement Map, Blur Map, Dots, Rounded Rectangle. To install, extract and place all three DLL files in your paint.net/Effects/ folder.

plugin_index.title: Curves+ v2.10
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: A more powerful version of the Curves adjustment that comes with paint.net. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Custom Brushes 5.1.5
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete. Use CustomBrushesMini.

plugin_index.title: CustomBrushesMini 1.0 RC3
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Superseded. Use CustomBrushesMini.

plugin_index.title: CustomBrushesMini v2.1
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Draw with customized brushes. Replaces previous incarnations of Custom Brushes. Found in Simon Brown's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: CustomFrame 1.5
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Add a pre-created frame to your image.

plugin_index.title: CustomTexture v1.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Apply a custom texture to an image while maintaining the saturation. Found in Simon Brown's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Cut Color
plugin_index.author: xmario
plugin_index.desc: Cuts one color & shades of it from your image. Choose color to leave & pixels of a different color are changed to transparent (or black and white).

plugin_index.title: Cutout Effect
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Broken. A newer version is available in Illnab1024's Plugins, however this also seems to be non-functional.

plugin_index.title: Cutout Effect
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Broken. Alternative can be found in Illnab1024's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Cutter
plugin_index.author: MOP3E
plugin_index.desc: Create an image map with this simple intuitive interface. Select regions of the image and save the necessary sub-images and code to recreate the original image. A number of code formats are supported including HTML.

plugin_index.title: Cyanotype
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Recolor an image to white + cyan. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Cycle HSV
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Rotate color values according to Hue, Saturation and Value (Brightness).

plugin_index.title: DDS File Support
plugin_index.author: Dean Ashton
plugin_index.desc: Enables DDS file loading & saving. Included paint.net 3.1+. Forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: DDS FileType Plus
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: An extension to the internal DDS FileType, this plugin allows paint.net to open and save the some DDS formats introduced in DirectX 10 and later. Source code has been made available on GitHub.
plugin_index.dlls: DdsFileTypePlus.dll, and one of DdsFileTypePlusIO_x64.dll or DdsFileTypePlusIO_x86.dll

plugin_index.title: Dents Classic
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: The original version of the Dents effect. This version has a more complex UI than the one built into paint.net, and adds Stretch and Edge Behaviour options

plugin_index.title: Desktop Background Preview
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Allows you to preview potential images as a desktop wallpaper. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Detect plugin problems v1.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: External program which diagnoses why effect and filetype plugins may not be working.

plugin_index.title: Diagonal Lines v2.0
plugin_index.author: jsonchiu
plugin_index.desc: Renders diagonal lines, frequency, brush width, antialias level & angle are all configurable. DLL compiled by EER (21 Feb 2013) from posted source as download link has died.

plugin_index.title: DICOM FileType
plugin_index.author: Rapido
plugin_index.desc: Adds loading support for DICOM image files (Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine). The format is used for medical imagery. NB: place both *.dll files into /Filetypes/

plugin_index.title: Dimensions
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Renders dimensioning arrows.  NOTE: the plugin will NOT provide an accurate measure of anything. It simply draws the arrrows.

plugin_index.title: Directional Blur
plugin_index.author: HorridoJoho
plugin_index.desc: Applies a directional blur. Much like Motion Blur, but faster.

plugin_index.title: Displacement
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Displace an image in X and Y directions. Has rendering issues. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Displacement and Alpha Mask
plugin_index.author: Bleek II
plugin_index.desc: Distorts an image based on the light values of the mask.

plugin_index.title: Displacement Map
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Pixels are offset by the amount determined by the map channel and the displacement slider, and are offset in the direction of the angle chooser. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: Display Color Change Direction
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Reinterprets an image into a recolored version using multiple hues shifted from the original. Source available. See post #41 for 3.5x version.

plugin_index.title: Dissolve 1.3
plugin_index.author: APShredder
plugin_index.desc: Dissolves one image onto another.

plugin_index.title: Distort This!
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: This is an update of TR's Distort This! with additional features and optimizations. Distort a layer using four control points. Useful for distorting, stretching or skewing.

plugin_index.title: Distorting Mirror
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Effect similar to the distorting mirror you find at a fairground. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Distortion Effects (4 effects)
plugin_index.author: Rick Brewster
plugin_index.desc: The effects Bulge, Polar Inversion, Tile Reflection & Twist are now included paint.net as of version 2.70+

plugin_index.title: Dither - Atkinson Halftone
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: This effect DOES NOT work correctly if you have any selection active. It should ONLY be used on whole layers. Found in Ed's Egregious Effects

plugin_index.title: Dither - Floyd-Steinberg Halftone
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: This effect DOES NOT work correctly if you have any selection active. It should ONLY be used on whole layers. Found in Ed's Egregious Effects

plugin_index.title: Donut Distortion
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Distort the area between two concentric circles. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Dot Plugin
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Reduce an image to monochrome comprised of dark dots on a light background.

plugin_index.title: DotMatrix
plugin_index.author: NomBot
plugin_index.desc: Reinterpret an image as if it was composed from colored dots with highlighting and shadowing.

plugin_index.title: Dots
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Turn image into a grid of dots. Options to adjust the size and highlighting. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: Dpy's Pack
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Black and Alpha+, Color Balance+, Multi-Threshold, Rotate_Zoom+, Perspective Effect, AA's Assistant, Metallize, Text+, Circle Text, Rotate Text, Spiral Text & Wave Text, Speech Bubble, 1px Expansion, Alpha to 0, Alpha to 255

plugin_index.title: Dr Scott's Markup Renderer
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Render markup including web pages, tables, text, XML and complex mathematical equations (MathML, TeX or LaTeX formats) straight to the paint.net canvas. Note: rendering of math equations requires an internet connection. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.desc: Uses (and builds on) the Grid Maker plugin to render graphs.

plugin_index.title: Graph Paper
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Generates graph paper with adjustable Cell Size & grouping. Options include square or isometric grids, and colorization. Requires installation of OptionBased library v0.7.9.

plugin_index.title: Gravity
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Treats pixels as if they were sand, dragging them down until they have supporting pixels under them. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Grayscale on Colored Paper
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Recolors the image greyscale and the specified color. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Grayscale+
plugin_index.author: StormWare
plugin_index.desc: Instead of averaging RGB like normal Grayscale, Grayscale+ retains the greatest of the RGB values.

plugin_index.title: Green Tint Reduction
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Intelligently reduces the amount of green tint in an image without introducing magenta as a by-product

plugin_index.title: GREYCstoration Wrapper *BETA*
plugin_index.author: Crazy Man Dan
plugin_index.desc: Replaced by the built-in Effects > Noise > Reduce Noise effect. Forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: Greyscale channel mixer
plugin_index.author: andersbursjoo
plugin_index.desc: Converts images to greyscale with luminescence control. Download link is broken so plugin cannot be downloaded.

plugin_index.title: Grid Maker
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Draws grids, also checkerboard and dots. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Grid Maker v3.0
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Creates girds and checkerboards. Updated for paint.net 4.0.6. Also found in BoltBait's plugin pack.

plugin_index.title: Grid Warp
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Distort an image by overlaying a warping grid which has dragable intersection nodes. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Gridlines
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Draws a grid with horizontal and vertical lines. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Grim Color Reaper
plugin_index.author: Jotaf
plugin_index.desc: Remove a color (i.e. background) from an image while maintaining the alpha information.

plugin_index.title: GuideLines
plugin_index.author: xod
plugin_index.desc: Draws guiding lines as an aid to drawing, alignment & sizing.

plugin_index.title: Halftone
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Simulates continuous tones in the image through the use of dots of varying size, shape, spacing and density. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Hardware Accelerated Blur Pack
plugin_index.author: Bruce Bowyer-Smyth
plugin_index.desc: Use your video card to process images with a potentially huge performance leap. The blurs in this pack are: Channel Blur, Gaussian Blur, Motion Blur, Radial Blur & Zoom Blur.
plugin_index.dlls: ComputeShaderEffects.dll & one of SlimDX.D3D11.x64.dll or SlimDX.D3D11.x86.dll

plugin_index.title: HD Photo plugin - BETA
plugin_index.author: Rick Brewster
plugin_index.desc: Support for HD imaging. No longer supported. See JPEG XR filetype plugin

plugin_index.title: Heightmap
plugin_index.author: radobot
plugin_index.desc: Transforms an image to a heightmap. Imagine shining a light on an uneven surface. Lightness of each pixel represents it's height.

plugin_index.title: Helix
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Draws a range of helical and spiral shapes. Many choices of shapes and colours.

plugin_index.title: Hexagonal Grid
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates a hexagonal grid. Includes brushwidth & Antialias controls. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Hide / Reveal Steganography
plugin_index.author: Radobot
plugin_index.desc: Hide (and reveal) images within another image. Similar in concept to BoltBait's Steganography plugin with more options.

plugin_index.title: High Pass
plugin_index.author: cookies
plugin_index.desc: High pass filter - used to correct (sharpen) images in much the same way as Unsharp Mask

plugin_index.title: Highlight
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Creates the twinkly highlights you find in a photo that is taken towards the sun, highlights on water or metallic text. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Hilbert filling curve texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Uses the space-filling Hilbert formula (Peano 1890, Hilbert 1891) to fill the target region with a continuous path. The path is comprised of short, straight lines whose ends either continue in the same direction or undergo a 90 degree turn. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: HIS Filetype
plugin_index.author: Rapido
plugin_index.desc: Load and save HIS His image format (used for X-Ray flatpanels from PerkinElmer).

plugin_index.title: Homeworld2 ROT file import
plugin_index.author: susgeorgesu
plugin_index.desc: Import Homeworld 2 ROT image files as used in the game 'Home World 2' by Sierra Entertainment, Inc.

plugin_index.title: Hot Metal Glow
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Transforms a pixel's color to mimic incandescent heated metal. The color range goes from black, to red, to orange, to yellow, and finally to white. The color transition is approximate: no attempt is made to imitate actual physics. Find 3.5.11 compatible version in post #8 of the thread.

plugin_index.title: HSV Eraser
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Remove any color from images using the Hue, Saturation and Value color space. Many options including Tolerances which are used to specify a range of closely associated hues. Source available.

plugin_index.title: HSV Scrambler
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Change the Hue, Saturation, and Value of each pixel by allowing any of the components to be derived from a scaled and offset version of any of the other components. See post #11 for PDN3.5 version.

plugin_index.title: Hue  / Saturation
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Similar to the built in Hue / Saturation effect and up to 50 times faster. Found in Ed Harvey's FastFx plugin pack.
plugin_index.dlls: EdHarvey.FastFx.dll, EdHarvey.FastFx.pdb and one of FastBlur_x64.dll or FastBlur_x86.dll

plugin_index.title: Hue / Saturation Plus
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Adjust the hue, saturation and lightness using sliders.

plugin_index.title: Hue / Saturation+
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Removed by the author following enhancements to the built-in Hue/Saturation adjustment (paint.net v 3.5.2)

plugin_index.title: Icon, Cursor, and Animated Cursor Format
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. An updated version has been posted by TechnoRobbo in post #299 of the thread. Support for Icon & cursor filetypes, including animated cursors.

plugin_index.title: Icon, Cursor, and Animated Cursor Format - Updated
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: An updated version of the Icon, Cursor, and Animated Cursor Filetype plugin. This version adds support for Icon & cursor filetypes, including animated cursors to paint.net 4.0.9+

plugin_index.title: IFF filetype
plugin_index.author: rmtew
plugin_index.desc: Uses the SDLimage library to extend support to the IFF filetype.

plugin_index.title: IFF ILBM (Amiga) Loader
plugin_index.author: Zombieman
plugin_index.desc: Loader for IFF ILBM images (native file format of the old Commodore Amiga computers). Supports loading HAM6 and HAM8 modes (and in theory HAM5 and HAM7 modes). Does not handle IFF24 images (max 8-bit images).

plugin_index.title: Illnab1024's Plugins. (v1.1)
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Alpha Mask, Cutout Effect, Advanced Greyscale, Point Warp, Polar to Rect.

plugin_index.title: Im(age)PDF filetype
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Allows paint.net to open and save images as PDF documents. Requires OptionBasedLibrary and Ghostscript be installed.
plugin_index.dlls: ImPDF.Save.FileType.dll, ImPDF.Command.exe, ImPDF.Open.FileType.dll/dlc (paint.net/FileTypes/ folder), OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dll/.dlc (paint.net/ folder)

plugin_index.title: Image Tiling FileType
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Splits an image into tiles and saves them a zip file.

plugin_index.title: Image To Code (AKA Image To C)
plugin_index.author: ShayEr
plugin_index.desc: Convert image to C/C++ data structure.

plugin_index.title: ImageInText
plugin_index.author: xod
plugin_index.desc: Creates text mask using the source layer as the text fill, alternatively creates transparent text within the source layer

plugin_index.title: ImAGIF
plugin_index.author: Midora
plugin_index.desc: Loads and saves animated gif files.

plugin_index.title: ImAPNG
plugin_index.author: Midora
plugin_index.desc: Loads and saves animated PNG files.

plugin_index.title: Imgur Uploader
plugin_index.author: JoZ1
plugin_index.desc: Upload images directly from paint.net to imgur.com. Returns links to image in a number of formats.

plugin_index.title: Increase Local Contrast
plugin_index.author: MichaelVinther
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Improve badly lit photos or dramatize dull photos.

plugin_index.title: Ink Sketch
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Converts image to inked sketch version. Included paint.net 3.10+

plugin_index.title: InkSketch+
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Turns images into a black and white inked facsimile. Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Inner Shadow
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Projects a shadow from the object's edge inwards or away from the transparent surrounding pixels. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Inner Shadow Selection
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Applies shadowing from the edge of a selection which fades towards the inside of the selection. Very similar to Object Inner Shadow, but this works with selections and not objects. BoltBait's Plugin Pack for v4.0

plugin_index.title: Input to Output
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Adjust the value of one color channel (Input) by the value of another channel (Output). Useful for making alpha masks, removing color, etc.. Found in Mike Ryan's Plugins

plugin_index.title: InputToOutput+
plugin_index.author: Xarx
plugin_index.desc: Sets one image channel (RGBA) from another channel or from other basic pixel characteristic (CMYK component, HSV component, luminance, etc,)

plugin_index.title: Inset Box Shadow
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Uses inner shadowing to create photo type frame of varying transparency. Imagine a square vignette which can be placed inside the edge of an image by a given margin. Source available.

plugin_index.title: Inside Out
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Appears to be a Cartesian to polar transformation (i.e. rectangular image is distorted to circular). Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: IntenColor
plugin_index.author: P13Darksight
plugin_index.desc: Takes the intensity of the current pixel & performs mathematical operations on it to adjust the color.

plugin_index.title: Interchange File Format
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Filetype plugin which loads files in some of the IFF file formats. No save option is supported. IFF is a container format which may contain numerous data types (images, animations, documents, audio, video, ...). This format was used on Atari and Amiga computers in the 1990's.

plugin_index.title: Interlace
plugin_index.author: tunedude
plugin_index.desc: Adds horizontal/vertical stripes of color/transparency to the image.

plugin_index.title: Invert Alpha
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Inverts the Alpha Channel based off of your set tolerance. Found in Mike Ryan's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Invert Alpha
plugin_index.author: person_321
plugin_index.desc: Deleted by Author as another plugin of this nature exists: use Invert Alpha.

plugin_index.title: Invert around primary color
plugin_index.author: Enormator
plugin_index.desc: Invert colors around other colors.

plugin_index.title: Invert Channels
plugin_index.author: person_321
plugin_index.desc: Invert the intensity of any of the RGB channels. Found in Person_321's Texture & Color Plugins

plugin_index.title: Invert Intensity
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Invert the intensity of the color range in an image. Found in Ed Harvey Effects v3.5

plugin_index.title: iPhone Tab Bar Icon Maker
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Helper for assisting with the creation of iphone icons. Also known as RGB Intensity to Alpha. Found in Stu's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Isolate Black / White
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Generates a B&W copy of the layer then applies it as an alpha mask.

plugin_index.title: Isolate Lineart
plugin_index.author: silverhammer
plugin_index.desc: Converts a B/W image (like a pencil drawing) to a 'black and transparent' image.

plugin_index.title: Isometric Cuboid
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Generates a Rectangular Cuboid and shows it using Isometric projection

plugin_index.title: Isometric Tiler
plugin_index.author: Mallaboro
plugin_index.desc: Turns orthogonal images into isometric spritesheets. As of v1.0 it is limited only to tiles sized  64px x 128px tiles. Source includes & bat installer

plugin_index.title: Jesse Chunn Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: jchunn
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Soften edges, Focal point, Stencil, Color Replace, Varicose, Bricks.

plugin_index.title: Jigsaw Puzzle
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Generates a Jigsaw Puzzle cut-out of an image.

plugin_index.title: Jitter v3.0
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Jitters' each row of pixels by a random amount, giving a shimmy type effect. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: JPEG 2000
plugin_index.author: Gumboot
plugin_index.desc: Use JPEG 2000 instead.

plugin_index.title: JPEG 2000
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Loads and saves JPEG 2000 images, superseding the old JPEG 2000 plugin.
plugin_index.dlls: Jpeg2000Filetype.dll and one of Jpeg2000IO_x64.dll or Jpeg2000IO_x86.dll

plugin_index.title: JPEG Effect
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Distorts an image by running it through the JPEG codec. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: JPEG XR
plugin_index.author: Chrysler
plugin_index.desc: Load and save JPEG XR (aka HD Photo) image files

plugin_index.title: Julia plus
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Based on the built-in Julia fractal effect, this version has more configurable options. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Jumble
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Jumbles the image in horizontal and vertical elements. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: KaleidGen
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Generate kaleidoscopes from scratch using selectable auto generated shapes. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Kaleidoscope
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Turn images into kaleidoscopes. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Kaleidoscope Effect
plugin_index.author: pleabo
plugin_index.desc: Generate kaleidoscopic effects. Has center point selector and a source angle rotator. Also known as DPL Kaleidoscope. 3.5.11 version compiled by Maximilian.

plugin_index.title: Kill Color Keeper
plugin_index.author: Pratyush
plugin_index.desc: Update of Jotaf's Grim Color Reaper. User has the option of killing (removing) the specified color, or keeping it (removing other colors).

plugin_index.title: Kill Color v1.1
plugin_index.author: HiPhiSch
plugin_index.desc: Removes a color from the selected part of the image and tries to find a substitution for it by analyzing the surrounding parts.

plugin_index.title: Koch Snowflake Fractal
plugin_index.author: stuff_gnome
plugin_index.desc: Renders the Koch fractal snowflake in configurable complexity, with brushwidth & antialias options.

plugin_index.title: Kodak Tri-x 400 Emulator
plugin_index.author: johandanforth
plugin_index.desc: Emulates a Kodak Tri-x 400 filter (enhanced greyscale). Tri-X is a classic high-speed black-and-white photographic film from Kodak. Tri-X 400 is usually rated at ISO 400 when processed in standard developers and remains among the fastest black-and-white films today.

plugin_index.title: KrisVDM's Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Plugin pack contains installer and a DLL file. Run installer to selectively install effects in this pack. Effects: Drop Shadow, Duotone Light, Duotone Ink on Paper, Cyanotype, Sepia 2, Grayscale on Colored Paper, Monochrome Ink on Paper, Average Blur, Smart Blur, Color Accent, Fade Edge, Gradient, Gridlines, Object Align.

plugin_index.title: Kuwahara Filter
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: A noise-reduction filter which smooths out the subject while preserving the definition of edges between tones.

plugin_index.title: Lameography
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: paint.net 4.0x version of BoltBait's Lomography plugin.

plugin_index.title: Laplacian pyramid filter
plugin_index.author: MichaelVinther
plugin_index.desc: Improve the overall illumination of photos, typically when the scene is in shadow. Can smooth or enhance details in a photo without smoothing edges.

plugin_index.title: Lattice
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Transform the image to a duotone (Primary/Secondary) lattice. Effect is not unlike a embroidery pattern. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Layer Cake
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Slice an image into concentric circles and applies incremental rotations to each slice.

plugin_index.title: Layer Saver
plugin_index.author: I Like Pi
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Standalone executable saves each layer in a paint.net file as a separate file.

plugin_index.title: LCD Subsampling resize
plugin_index.author: xrl
plugin_index.desc: Resizes image horizontally at 50% while retaining sharpness.

plugin_index.title: Lens
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Overlay a magnifying lens. Size of lens is not configurable, but magnification is. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Lens Distortion Correction
plugin_index.author: hihellohi
plugin_index.desc: Distortion correction effect. Also displays meta data (Exif).

plugin_index.title: Lens Flare
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Adds light induced flares to the bright spots in your image. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Lens Flare
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Mimics a photographic lens flare (created when non-image forming light enters the camera lens or digital sensor). Lens flares appear as a string of polygonal shapes extending from the light source across the image. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Lens Flare (aka CameraTrouserFlare)
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Adds sunlight induced lens flare effect to images. You've gotta love the name.

plugin_index.title: Level Horizon
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Correct photos which have been taken on a tilt by levelling the horizon.

plugin_index.title: Light Rays
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Draws 'rays' of light from the center (can be offset). Uses alternated triangles as the rays. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Lightning
plugin_index.author: cookies
plugin_index.desc: Create lightning, smoke and other cool energy bolts.

plugin_index.title: Line Tracer
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: An edge detection / lineart effect with options to configure Line Width, Threshold (strength of the effect) and Color.

plugin_index.title: Lines/Grid
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Creates vertical/horizontal lines or grids. Line width and coloring options. Also available in Russian.

plugin_index.title: Linocut
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Mimics the Linocut printmaking technique which uses grooves cut into a sheet of linoleum to create a relief surface. The grooves appear white, the rest of the image black - unless inverted. Also available in Russian. Source available.

plugin_index.title: Liquify
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Similar to Photoshop's Liquify or GIMP's IWarp. Compatible with Photoshop's mesh files. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: List of color palettes
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Tiles PDN palettes in the /Palettes/ folder to the canvas. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Local Contrast Enhancement
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Clarify flat or hazy looking photos by selectively adjusting the contrast. Found in Tanel's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Local Noise
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Similar to the Frosted Glass effect, but with more configuration options (Radius, Strength, Coverage, Distance Bias, etc,). Great for adding a bit of diffusion to an element.

plugin_index.title: Lomography
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Simulate the effects of a Lomo camera : high contrast, twisted colors and a noticeable vignette.

plugin_index.title: LookAtIt.Effect
plugin_index.author: Midora
plugin_index.desc: View image files including animated image files.Supported formats: Animated GIFs: *.gif, *.agif, Animated IFFs: *.anim, *.iff, *.ilbm, *.lbm (Amiga and Atari), Animated PNGs: *.png, *.apng (ImAPNG.FileType required), Animated WebPs: *.webp, *.awebp (ImAWEBP.FileType required)

plugin_index.title: Low Color Filetype (bmp, gif, png)
plugin_index.author: jxp
plugin_index.desc: Save images as 16 color bitmaps or gifs. Previously known as '16 Colors'.

plugin_index.title: MadJik' Plugin Pack (aka Magical Plugins Megapack)
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Over 60 effects: Color Zoom Blur, Gradient Blur, Change Extreme Colors, Color Aberration, Expand Color, Recolor Gray, Reverse Colors, Distorting Mirror, Donut Distortion, Gravity, Kaleidoscope, Magnifier, Melting, otion Sharpen, Oblique, Page Curl, Paneling, Polar Transformations, Seamless Texture Maker, Sine Wave, Tiles Reflection, Tube Effect, TwistZ, Water Reflection, Waves, Wet Floor Reflection, Auto Chrome Noise, Smooth Noise, Bars, Buttons, Fractal Curly Tree, Fractal Fern Leaf, Frames, Grid Maker, Hexagonal Grid, KaleidGen, Lens Flare, Random Lines, Random Maze1, Random Maze2, Rosaces, Shapes, Sparkles, Spiral, SpiroGraph, SpiroShapes, Splashes, Stars, Volutes, XY Coords, Spot the Centre, Majority Color, Over Liner, Star Glow, Varicose 2, Animal Texture, Auto Chrome Grain, Color Modulo, Fractal Attractor, Hilbert curve, Julia 'plus', Light Rays, Moire, Nebulous, Newton Fractal, Perlin Texture, Radial Colors, Rainbow Twist Colors, Regular Noise, Sierpinski Triangle, Tournesol, Vibrato, Fill from Palette, Generate 96 Colors, List of Palettes, Displacement, Polygones.

plugin_index.title: Magnifier (Lens+)
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: An evolution of the Ed Harvey's Lens effect, with enhanced features & options. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Majority Color
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Each pixel takes the value of its neighbors that have the majority. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Make Colour Transparent
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete. Use Color to Alpha Advanced.

plugin_index.title: Make Transparent
plugin_index.author: GoldenCrystal
plugin_index.desc: Make an image transparent in respect of the chosen color. In other words this is another color to alpha plugin.

plugin_index.title: Mandala
plugin_index.author: NomBot
plugin_index.desc: Renders and rotate cardinal splines in color and with various brush settings.
plugin_index.dlls: mandala.dll & mandala.dlc, OptionBasedLibrary v0.7.9.dll & OptionBasedLibrary v0.7.9.dlc

plugin_index.title: Manual Color Correction
plugin_index.author: Gaeriel
plugin_index.desc: Change colors by transforming one color into another. Similar to the 'Manual Color Correction' tool in Paint Shop Pro.

plugin_index.title: Matrice
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: An emboss type effect with coloring options. Can be used to fake metallic sheen and edge detection.

plugin_index.title: Measure Object
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Measures an object in a selection within the active layer. Measurements returned are: area, location, width, height, diagonal, and angles of the bounding rectangle.
plugin_index.dlls: MeasureObject.dll & MeasureObject.dlc (/Effects folder), OptionBasedLibrary vY.Y.dll & OptionBasedLibrary vY.Y.dlc (paint.net installation folder)

plugin_index.title: Measure Selection
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Take measurements of an active selection or the whole layer. Option include setting the unit, dpi and scale. Useful for mapping or technical drawings.

plugin_index.title: Melting
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: This effect takes the top of the selected region and distorts to make it appear as if it was melting. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Metallize
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Applies a chrome or metallic sheen to an image (an effect like the Predator's vision). Great for faking all sorts of metals. Found in dpy's Pack.

plugin_index.title: Mexican Hat Edge Detect
plugin_index.author: PhilipLB
plugin_index.desc: A simple Mexican Hat edge detection filter.

plugin_index.title: Mike Ryan's Plugins
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Alias, Color Trimming, Input to Output, Brightness/ Darkness to Alpha, Invert Alpha, Silhouette Plus.

plugin_index.title: Mirror / Rotate
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: v4.0x version of Mirror / Rotate - originally found in Toli's Effects plugin pack.

plugin_index.title: Mirror / Rotate
plugin_index.author: Toli
plugin_index.desc: Mirror selection horizontally, vertically, or over a diagonal. Rotate a selection. Found in Toli's Effects. See also Mirror / Rotate Menu

plugin_index.title: Mirror / Rotate Menu
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: v4.0x version of Mirror / Rotate Menu - originally found in Toli's Effects plugin pack.

plugin_index.title: Mirror / Rotate Menu
plugin_index.author: Toli
plugin_index.desc: Mirror selection horizontally, vertically, or over a diagonal. Rotate a selection. This is the same effect as Mirror/Rotate but houses the effects in the Mirror submenu. Found in Toli's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Mirror Over Line
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Mirror an image across a vertical or horizontal line. Found in Evan's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Mirror Selection
plugin_index.author: GOAE
plugin_index.desc: Mirror a selection horizontally, vertically or both.

plugin_index.title: Modify Channels v1.0.0
plugin_index.author: LWChris
plugin_index.desc: Create and configure multiple channel modifications. Each modification manipulates one image channel, using one or more arguments to calculate the new value for the target channel.

plugin_index.title: Moire
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: This texture plugin replaces the selection (or the active layer if no selection) with colourful concentric rings. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Monochrome
plugin_index.author: hollander
plugin_index.desc: Unsupported. Download links fail. Converts image to monochrome (black, white & color supported).

plugin_index.title: Monochrome Ink on Paper
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Recolors image a single specified hue. Transparent areas are left unchanged. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Mosaic Effect - v1.0.0.0
plugin_index.author: Tim!
plugin_index.desc: Converts a drawing into a mosaic pattern, using the Secondary colour as the adhesive or grout between the tesserae. Found in Tim's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Mosaic Maniac (Collage Paint)
plugin_index.author: MosaicManiac
plugin_index.desc: Paint with whole collections of images! Creates a unique non repeatable pattern of images form a directory of images. Menu title is Collage Paint.

plugin_index.title: Motion Sharpen
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Directional sharpening. Think of it as the natural opposite of Motion Blur. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Multi Color Gradient
plugin_index.author: romein
plugin_index.desc: Create a Linear, Radial, or Square multi-colored gradient with custom colors, direction and opacity.

plugin_index.title: MultiSpline
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Renders a series of closely spaced 'splines' (a spline is a smooth curve through points). Uses either random displacement or the source layer as it's base. Large number of options to customize the effect.

plugin_index.title: Multi-Threshold
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Run multiple 'threshold' filters at once. Excellent for turning a photo into Warhol inspired pop-art. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: MultiView Warp
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Distorts an image into a multifaceted view. Similar to the Fragment Blur without the blurring, or Glass Blocks without the rounded edges. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: MyCreaLogo
plugin_index.author: roro69
plugin_index.desc: NB: French language plugin. Creates wordart syle text transformations. Many options.

plugin_index.title: Nebulous
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates a brightly colored rainbow halo which appears pinched up in the centre. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Nebulous texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Uses a formula originally provided by Tom Jackson (CodeLab originator) to fill the canvas with a colored pattern (rainbow colors). Found in Magical Plugins Megapack

plugin_index.title: Neon Edges
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Simulated neon glow around the edges in an image. Options: line thickness, glow intensity, hue & saturation. Two versions are available, one for 3.5x and 4.0x and an enhanced version for 4.0x only. Both versions are also available in Russian.

plugin_index.title: Newton Fractal texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Fills the layer or selection with the Newton fractal. The Newton fractal is a boundary set in the complex plane which is characterized by Newton's method applied to a fixed polynomial p ( Z )  C [ Z ] or transcendental function. Beautiful colorful fractals in other words. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack

plugin_index.title: NewtonFractal
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Fractal generator. Creates colored flower-type petals infilled with colored noise. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Night Vision
plugin_index.author: pleabo
plugin_index.desc: Transform a scene into a green filtered 'Night Vision' version.

plugin_index.title: Noise Bleacher
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Desaturates and adds noise to an image. Options to control the desaturation hues and noise intensity.

plugin_index.title: Noise Reduction
plugin_index.author: ncoquard
plugin_index.desc: Noise reduction plugin, written specifically to reduce the artefacts in JPG images.

plugin_index.title: Noisechoice
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Add noise, with a range of choices including anti-aliasing to transparency. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Normal Map
plugin_index.author: stinger
plugin_index.desc: Height field (gray scale) to normal map (creates a much better illusion of height).

plugin_index.title: Normal Map Renderer
plugin_index.author: eekysam
plugin_index.desc: Renders normal maps. Has a cinematic light that which can be moved around the virtual 3D surface. Also has exponential drop-off/spread settings which can be used to modify sharpness, contrast, brightness, and angle effect (dialog is deceptively simple). Plugin is no longer being developed.

plugin_index.title: Normal Tools v1.1
plugin_index.author: gOUJOSAMMA
plugin_index.desc: Suite of three plugins for the creation of Normal Maps.

plugin_index.title: Normalize
plugin_index.author: PhilipLB
plugin_index.desc: Normalize stretches the histogram (entire color range is used).

plugin_index.title: NormalMap 1.1
plugin_index.author: harold
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete. Use either NormalMapPlus(PDN 4) or NormalMapPlus v1.0 (PDN 3.5x)

plugin_index.title: NormalMapPlus
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: The latest version of the NormalMap plugin (previous versions by Harold and Simon Brown). Uses a Sobel Filter to calculate the first order derivatives of the image (think: emboss). The three sliders control the strength of the effect (depth of the embossing).

plugin_index.title: NormalMapPlus v1.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Use NormalMapPlus.

plugin_index.title: Null54's Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Plugin pack. Effects: Kuwahara filter, PSFilterPdn, Radical Image Optimization Tool (RIOT), Soft Proofing, Twainable+. FileTypes: Base 64 FileType, EA Fsh FileType, Image Tiling FileType, JPEG 2000 FileType, Optimized JPEG FileType, Paint Shop Pro FileType, Photoshop Brush FileType, Photoshop Pattern FileType, Raw FileType, WebP FileType.

plugin_index.title: Object Align
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Realigns an object within a selection vertically, horizontally, left, right or centrally (and combinations). Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Object Bevel
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Apply different shaped bevels to an object, with either parallel or perspective lighting at a full range of angles. Bevels types: convex round, inset convex, convex bevel, convex chamfer, double convex, convex linear-flat, convex flat-linear, concave round, inset concave, flat.

plugin_index.title: Object Edges
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Produces a range of outline/bevel effects on objects. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Object Inner Shadow
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Inner Shadow projects a shadow from the edge of an object inwards. The shadow fades as it extends inwards. The natural twin to Drop Shadow in many respects. Part of BoltBait's plugin pack (3.5.x and 4.x)

plugin_index.title: Object Reflections - Wet Floor Effect
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete. Use [member=MadJik]'s Wet Floor Reflection.

plugin_index.title: Object Shadow
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Drop shadow effect for objects. For a code walk-through see How to Write an Effect Plugin (Part 7 - Extra Surface)

plugin_index.title: Object Tools
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: A mini pack of effects which work on objects (groups of pixels with surrounding transparency). Bevel Object, Feather Object, Inner Shadow, Outline Object, Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Object2color
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Recolor opaque objects with anti-aliased edges on a transparent layer. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Oblique Effect
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Incline images vertically horizontally or both. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Octagonal/Quad reshape/matte
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Reshape the image or crop to an arbitrary quad or octagonal region. Found in Evan's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Offset
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Offset the layer or selection in horizontal and/or vertical directions. Image wraps at the edges. A less complicated version of the Panelling Effect.

plugin_index.title: Offset Alternating Stripes
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Creates alternating stripes of pixels with configurable horizontal offset, width and separation. Angle, Edge Behavior and Quality options are also available. See post #9 for 3.5.11 version.

plugin_index.title: Oil Painting+
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Updated Oil Painting artistic effect which produces a more natural looking oil painting. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Olden 1.5
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Applies and aged look to your image. Found in Simon Brown's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: OpenRaster Filetype
plugin_index.author: Zagna
plugin_index.desc: Ora file support. Requires exe download/run to install.

plugin_index.title: Optimized JPEG
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Optimizes JPEG images using jpegtran. To install place both the exe and dll in paint.net's FileTypes folder.

plugin_index.title: OptiPNG
plugin_index.author: I Like Pi
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. An updated version is available, see OptiPNG Updated. Integrates OptiPNG with paint.net, optimizes PNGs to make them smaller (http://optipng.sourceforge.net/). To install place both the exe and dll in paint.net's FileTypes folder.

plugin_index.title: OptiPNG (Updated)
plugin_index.author: Mr X
