plugin_index.desc: Updated version of OptiPNG (fixes some security vulnerabilities). Functionality is same: compresses the PNG filetype when saving images. Both the OptiPngFileType.dll and optipng.exe need to be in the FileTypes directory.

plugin_index.title: Organigram
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Renders simple relationship diagrams or organizational charts. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: OtherFarmColorReplacer
plugin_index.author: OtherFarm
plugin_index.desc: Remove or change a color or a range of colors. Numerous options including color selection and transparency.

plugin_index.title: Otsu's Thresholding
plugin_index.author: Rei
plugin_index.desc: Turns an image black and white keying off brightness distribution. An implementation of Otsu's Method.

plugin_index.title: Outline
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Puts an outline of the selected color around your object. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Outline Object
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Outlines an object by wrapping it in a customized edge. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Outline Object v2.6
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Place a border around object/area. Note: object must be surrounded by transparency. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Outline Selection
plugin_index.author: Aziz
plugin_index.desc: Outline the inside of a selection with a rectangular border. Use [member=BoltBait]'s Outline Selection

plugin_index.title: Outline Selection
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Outline the current selection with your choice of color and width. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Outlined / Gradient text
plugin_index.author: xod
plugin_index.desc: Renders text to the active layer with options to outline and gradient fill the text.

plugin_index.title: Overblur
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Effect useful for making textures or as a passable sharpen effect. You can compare the blurred picture to the original and choose how much of that change to apply. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Overliner
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Scans the image to find breaks in the colors between pixels. If the break is from dark to light then the pixel is replaced with the light color (otherwise the dark color). Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Page Curl
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates a curl on a corner of your image, just like a curling page. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Paint Shop Pro FileType
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Allows paint.net to load and save Jasc's Paint Shop Pro format.

plugin_index.title: paint.net Bulk Image Processor
plugin_index.author: Corillian
plugin_index.desc: Batch processor. Removed by paint.net developer for failing to comply with plugin guidelines. Forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: paint.net Effect Installation Right-Click Menu Option
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Simplifies plugin installation by adding an 'install' option to right click menu on plugin ZIP file.

plugin_index.title: paint.net Plugin Installer
plugin_index.author: Powerslave UK
plugin_index.desc: Removed due to license issues. Forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: paint.net Plugin Manager
plugin_index.author: Braiden
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Add or remove plugins from the paint.net/Effects folder.

plugin_index.title: paint.net Scriptor
plugin_index.author: HurryK
plugin_index.desc: Write composite effect scripts in a JavaScript-like-language. Allows the splitting of the original image into its composite parts on order to apply effects on each separate part and blend them together again.

plugin_index.title: paint.net Search for Firefox
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete. Use PDN OpenSearch Custom Toolbar.

plugin_index.title: Palette from image tool
plugin_index.author: jxp
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Extracts the palette from the current image & saves it to (or creates) a paint.net palette file.

plugin_index.title: PaletteConverter BETA
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Converts and edits palettes including paint.net, PSP and Kuler palettes. Will only save paint.net palettes. Beta.

plugin_index.title: Panelling Effect
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Allows the moving of selection, vertically, horizontally or both. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Paper Kaleidocycles
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: This plugin allows the creation of nets for kaleidocycles. A kaleidocycle is a ring of pyramids which can be twisted inwards and outwards to show different sides of the pyramids.

plugin_index.title: Parallel Lines and Patterns
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Draw parallel lines or patterns or fill a region with them. Like an enhanced paint.net Fill Style.
plugin_index.dlls: OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dll/.dlc to the paint.net/ folder.  ParallelLines.Effect.dll/.dlc to the paint.net/Effects/ folder

plugin_index.title: Paste Alpha
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Takes the clipboard contents and converts colors to grayscale, then uses the grayscale for Alpha values in the current layer (i.e. masking). Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Paste From Clipboard
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Copies the clipboard image into the active selection or layer. Many options for pasting, including resizing, tiling, offset, rotation, opacity and blending with any existing image.

plugin_index.title: Paste Warp +
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: An enhanced version of TechnoRobbo's Paste Warp plugin (all new code, same algorithm as the original). New features include the ability to move and scale the clipboard image, antialiasing and a number of clipboard tiling modes.

plugin_index.title: PasteFill
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Tiles the clipboard image across the canvas until filled. Much like Tile Fill from Clipboard

plugin_index.title: Pastel/Water Color
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Pastel/Water color filter. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: PCX Plug-In
plugin_index.author: Joshua Bell
plugin_index.desc: Load & save PCX images.

plugin_index.title: PDN File Info viewer
plugin_index.author: harold
plugin_index.desc: View information about a paint.net file (dimensions, number of layers and the version of paint.net used to save the image).

plugin_index.title: PDN OpenSearch Custom Tool Bar
plugin_index.author: L3ron
plugin_index.desc: Add the paint.net Search Engine (by Google) to Firefox or Internet Explorer toolbar.

plugin_index.title: PdnBench for paint.net v3.0
plugin_index.author: Rick Brewster
plugin_index.desc: Superseded by new version

plugin_index.title: PdnBench for paint.net v3.20
plugin_index.author: Rick Brewster
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete paint.net benchmarking utility (i.e. a system speed test using paint.net). Forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: PdnFF
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Allow filters from Adobe's Filter Factory (for Photoshop) to be run by paint.net.
plugin_index.dlls: PdnFF.dll and one of ffparse_x86.dll or ffparse_x64.dll.

plugin_index.title: PDNWatermark
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Add watermarks to your image. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Pencil Sketch
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Similar to the built in Pencil Sketch effect only up to 20 times faster. Found in Ed Harvey's FastFx plugin pack.
plugin_index.dlls: EdHarvey.FastFx.dll, EdHarvey.FastFx.pdb and one of FastBlur_x64.dll or FastBlur_x86.dll

plugin_index.title: Perlin Texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates brilliantly colored patterns. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Person_321's texture and color plugins
plugin_index.author: person_321
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Invert Channels, Rainbow loom, Sound wave & X Rainbow bars.

plugin_index.title: Perspective Effect (Beta)
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Trapezoid transform of your image by adjusting the height &/or width of the sides. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Perspective Lines
plugin_index.author: tzachs
plugin_index.desc: Draws vanishing points & guidelines to help you with drawing in perspective.

plugin_index.title: Photo Flood Fill
plugin_index.author: pleska
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Takes an image and 'flood-fill' it into the selection region, repeating it over and over.

plugin_index.title: Photoshop Brush
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Load and save brushes used by Adobe Photoshop. Brushes sampled from image data are supported, dynamically computed brushes are ignored.

plugin_index.title: Photoshop file plugin
plugin_index.author: frankb
plugin_index.desc: Plugin for loading and saving Photoshop files. Use Photoshop PSD file plugin.

plugin_index.title: Photoshop Pattern
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Load Pattern files used by Photoshop's Fill command. Only Grayscale, Indexed and RGB mode patterns (8-bit and 16-bit) are supported.

plugin_index.title: Photoshop PSD file plugin
plugin_index.author: taoyue
plugin_index.desc: Plugin for loading and saving Photoshop files. Version 2.5.0 (released on September 11, 2016) requires paint.net 4.0.11+

plugin_index.title: Photoshop Swatch Converter
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Converts Photoshop color swatches (ACO files) to paint.net. Swatches with more than 96 colors are split into multiple parts. RGB, HSB, CMYK and Grayscale color modes are supported.

plugin_index.title: Pie Chart
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Create a pie chart by entering category names and values. Found in Evan's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Pie Chart
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Renders a Pie Chart based on specified Colors and Values. Can also render Labels on the chart.

plugin_index.title: Pixelate (Cairo Pentagonal)
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Pixelate an image into irregular five sided polygons. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Pixelate (Hexagonal)
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Pixelate an image into regular six sided polygons. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Pixelate+ v1.0
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Enhanced pixelate effect, adds a new sampling mode (the one GIMP uses) as well as the ability to use non-square cells. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: PixelatedFrame
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Adds a frame to an image that is a pixelated version of the image itself. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: PixelCounter 2
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Generates an Excel Spreadsheet guide for Book Folding (folding the pages of a real book into decorative designs). This plugin uses the source image to create the folding mask. It does not modify the image.

plugin_index.title: PixelLab Beta 1
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Provides a simplified programming language in which to create effects/plugins. Note: Beta status.

plugin_index.title: Planetoid
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Create realistic looking 3D planets or 2D maps. Co-authored by TechnoRobbo. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Plugin Browser
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Superseded by a new version.

plugin_index.title: Plugin Browser (updated)
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Official re-release of the Dwarf Horde's Plugin Browser following a significant rewrite by toe_head2001. Locate, search and run effects from within the Plugin Browser. List installed plugins by Menu, Author, Alphabetically or by Keyword(s). Bookmark and add comments to your favourite plugins. Find information on plugins and see an effect preview image (where available).

plugin_index.title: Plugin Effect Installer 1.0
plugin_index.author: Hunter
plugin_index.desc: Simple plugin installer. Select the *.dll file to install and click Go. Easy.

plugin_index.title: PNG Preprocessor
plugin_index.author: niwax
plugin_index.desc: Optimizes image color range in order to reduce the saved PNG file size. Size of the file can be 40-80% of the original size.

plugin_index.title: PNG Sprite Matrix
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Takes all visible layers in a PDN image and arranges them into a Matrix as close to equal height and width as possible. Hidden Layers are ignored. Usage: File > Save As > Sprite Matrix (*.png).

plugin_index.title: PNM File Type Plugin
plugin_index.author: zeeshanejaz
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Reads and writes PNM Images. PNM is a portable bitmap format used in legacy software (more common in LINUX / UNIX Platforms). A newer version which is compatible with v4.0 is available.

plugin_index.title: Point Blur
plugin_index.author: boude
plugin_index.desc: Does the reverse of Zoom Blur (Zoom Blur blurs away from a certain point, Point Blur blurs towards the centre point).

plugin_index.title: Point Warp
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Distort an image by stretching it toward or away from a specified point. Found in Illnab1024's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Point Warp / Engorged Smudge
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Similar to the Bulge effect but in the horizontal plane instead of the vertical. Find a new version in Illnab1024's Plugins.

plugin_index.title: Point Warp / Engorged Smudge for PDN4
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: A recompilation of [member=illnab]'s plugin of the same name in order to make it compatible with 4.0x. The effect warps the layer about a single point with options to control the strength, radius and direction as well as the point location.

plugin_index.title: Polar Inversion Plus
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Some of the Plus features have been incorporated into the built-in Polar Inversion effect. This original effect has additional options in the 'Edge Behavior' list (primary color, secondary color, transparent, original)

plugin_index.title: Polar to Rect
plugin_index.author: Illnab1024
plugin_index.desc: Transformation of polar coordinates to cartesian. In effect this creates a wrap around distortion of the original image. Found in Illnab1024's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Polar Transformation
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Translate image from rectangular to polar coordinates and vice versa. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Polaroid Frame
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Overlays a frame with the correct size ratios to form a Polaroid. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: PolyGlitch (Glitch Effects)
plugin_index.author: gsuberland
plugin_index.desc: Plugin pack of 'glitch' effects. Effects include: 3Displace, CodeBook, Cumulative Math, Xor, Addition, Interlace Lines, Pixel Drag, Quad Flip, Row Shifter, Quadratic Looper, Render Raw File. Helpful HTML file included.

plugin_index.title: Polygon / Stars
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Render triangles, pentagons, hexagons and also stars. Useful for making standard shapes and the pointed edges of stickers. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Polygon Tool
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: A line tool - which will draw another line from the last drawing position to the current position.

plugin_index.title: Polygonal Transparency
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Create many sided polygons of transparent pixels. With options to feather edges & invert transparent areas. Found in Evan's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Polygones
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Draws closed polygons & star shapes. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Portable AnyMap (PNM) File Type
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Loads and save files in one of the PNM formats. PAM - Portable Arbitrary Map (Black and White, Grayscale, RGB; Alpha channel; raw only; up to 16bits per channel), PBM - Portable Bit Map: (Black and White; plain and raw), PGM - Portable Gray Map: (Grayscale; plain and raw; up to 16bits per channel), PPM - Portable Pixel Map: (RGB; plain and raw; up to 16bits per channel).

plugin_index.title: Portrait Effect
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Soften portraits to look more professional. Included paint.net 3.1+ as Effects > Photo > Soften Portrait (originally in Effects > Portrait).

plugin_index.title: Postage Stamp
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Creates an edge like a modern postage stamp (i.e. wave like perforations) around the image.

plugin_index.title: Poster
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Analyzes the BGR values within a selection, sorts them into bands by Hue, saturation and Tone. Averages these values, then recolours the image.

plugin_index.title: Posterize
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Posterize is now built in to paint.net. Find it in the Adjustments menu.

plugin_index.title: Posterize Alpha
plugin_index.author: jxp
plugin_index.desc: Based on the standard Posterize adjustment, with enhancements to also change the Alpha channel.

plugin_index.title: Posterize in HSV Space
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Enhanced Posterize effect that converts the color into HSV space, truncates the values, then converts back to RGB.

plugin_index.title: Posterize+
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Reduce colorization differences with options to limit the output to certain color channels. Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: PostScript FileType
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Imports PostScript (*.PS), Encapsulated PostScript (*.EPS), and Adobe Illustrator (*.AI) files and renders them as bitmap layers in paint.net. Requires Ghostscript to be installed.
plugin_index.dlls: ImPS,EPS,AI.Open.FileType.dll & ImPS,EPS,AI.Open.FileType.dlc (/FileTypes/). OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dll & OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dlc (paint.net installation folder)

plugin_index.title: Power Stretch 2.0 Beta
plugin_index.author: pyjo
plugin_index.desc: Stretch images in numerous ways including vertical, horizontal and bulge. Note: Beta

plugin_index.title: PreMultiply Alpha
plugin_index.author: chi77
plugin_index.desc: Premultiply the RGB channels with the Alpha channel, or reverse the procedure.

plugin_index.title: Primary Color Difference to Alpha
plugin_index.author: Enormator
plugin_index.desc: Calculates the difference between the pixel and primary color. The more they are equal, the more transparency will result.

plugin_index.title: Print It
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Customized printing tool with a huge range of options like paper size, image size, DPI setting, alignment & offset, tiling, header & footer, watermark, etc,

plugin_index.title: Printer+ v1.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Enhanced paint.net printing interface.

plugin_index.title: PS Emboss
plugin_index.author: cookies
plugin_index.desc: Embossing effect. Simulates the one in Photoshop.

plugin_index.title: PSFilterPDN
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Run (some) Photoshop Filters using paint.net.

plugin_index.title: Psychedelic
plugin_index.author: romein
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Filter creates a variety of psychedelic color effects.

plugin_index.title: Psychocolour
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Produce a large range of psychedelic colour effects. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Pure Black and White converter
plugin_index.author: AdamCG
plugin_index.desc: Converts image to a COMPLETELY black and white (not grayscale). Amount of black/white is configurable.

plugin_index.title: pyrochild plugins
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Curves+, Borders 'N Shapes, Gradient Bars, Film, Jitter, Outline Object, Stitch, Scriptlab, Gradient Mapping, Splatter, Pixelate+, Color Match, Random Effect, Random Shape Fill, Smudge, Trail, Gradient Blocks, Twist, Liquify, Grid Warp, Gradient Grid.

plugin_index.title: Quadrilateral Correction
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Remaps a defined quadrilateral to a rectangular image.

plugin_index.title: Quadrilateral Reshape
plugin_index.author: evanolds
plugin_index.desc: Reshape the image to an arbitrary quadrilateral region. Found in Evan's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Quick Gravity
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Stretches an image downwards (only). Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: QuickBASIC BSAVE Graphics
plugin_index.author: Ham62
plugin_index.desc: Adds support for Screen 13 QuickBASIC BSAVE'd graphics with the file extensions *.BSV or *.VGA. Limitations: maximum image size 320x200px, file size of 64kb, 8bpp & standard VGA color palette.

plugin_index.title: Radial Blur Deluxe
plugin_index.author: dake
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Configurable radial blur. Also known as Fast Radial Blur.

plugin_index.title: Radial Colors
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Predefined formulas (sinusoid curves) define and mix Red, Green, Blue colors. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Radial Fade
plugin_index.author: Rei
plugin_index.desc: Gradually fade an image to transparent from the center to the edges (or vice-versa). The transparency gain over distance to the center is modulable, as well as the circle size. For 3.5.11 compatible version see post #22

plugin_index.title: Radial Prism
plugin_index.author: Xhin
plugin_index.desc: Changes the hue of the image in a reflecting circular prism-like pattern.

plugin_index.title: Radical Image Optimization Tool (RIOT)
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Heavily optimizes then exports the current layer in a format suitable for web use.
plugin_index.dlls: RIOT.dll, FreeImage.dll & SaveForWebRIOT.dll + RIOTProxy.exe (place all in the Effects folder).

plugin_index.title: Radius Corners
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Round off the square corners of an image, with nicely anti-aliased edges. An update to dan9298's Radius Fill Corners plugin

plugin_index.title: Radius Fill Corners
plugin_index.author: dan9298
plugin_index.desc: Round off square corners.

plugin_index.title: Rainbow
plugin_index.author: spongey437
plugin_index.desc: Fills selection with a rainbow colored gradient.

plugin_index.title: Rainbow Loom
plugin_index.author: person_321
plugin_index.desc: Renders a pre-defined pattern. Found in Person_321's Texture & Color Plugins

plugin_index.title: Rainbow Twist
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Rainbow twist the three basic color Red, Green, Blue. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Rainbow-Splitter
plugin_index.author: Xhin
plugin_index.desc: Split an image into two sections, both of which can be colored by a repeating colored gradient of your choice.

plugin_index.title: Random Effect v1.2
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Chooses a random plugin (or built-in effect), and renders it with randomized settings. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Random lines Generator
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Create/add straight & curved lines. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Random mazes
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Two plugins to render horizontal or diagonal mazes with configurable size, wall chance, brush width & more. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Random Shape Fill v1.0
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Draws random (predefined) shapes on the canvas. 17 shape modes & 9 color modes plus many options. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: RAW File
plugin_index.author: cefoot
plugin_index.desc: paint.net 4.x version of RAW File. Note: this is a file reader, so there is no option to save in the RAW format.

plugin_index.title: RAW File
plugin_index.author: Pebal
plugin_index.desc: Dcraw based raw file reader. A paint.net 4.x version has been released: see Raw File

plugin_index.title: RAW FileType
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: This is a DCRaw-based raw filetype. Uses the latest incarnation of DCRaw.

plugin_index.title: RAWFile LAB
plugin_index.author: operamint
plugin_index.desc: A dcraw based RAWFile plugin with an advanced GUI. Requires 64-bit dcraw.exe to be downloaded, renamed and placed in Filetypes folder.

plugin_index.title: Rawload v1.0
plugin_index.author: avatare
plugin_index.desc: Load *.raw files with metadata using the Windows Imaging Component and preserving the image metadata.

plugin_index.title: RawLoader
plugin_index.author: rpetrich
plugin_index.desc: Decode RAW camera images and make them available for use in paint.net. Requires use of installer or plugin + DCRaw.exe. Download links are not working.

plugin_index.title: RawReader
plugin_index.author: Ivn
plugin_index.desc: Dcraw based RAW file reader. DCRaw has been recompiled as a *.dll (32 and 64 bit).
plugin_index.dlls: RawReader.dll and one of dcraw.dll or dcraw64.dll

plugin_index.title: Recolor Gray
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Recolors gray (and other shades) to transform areas of grayscale into full color. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Recolor Using Palette
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Recolors each pixel with the nearest color from a specified range in the current palette. The Euclidean distance is used to make the match (minimizes the squared differences between the RGB components).

plugin_index.title: Recolour choice
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Presents multiple methods to select and replace a colour. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Red Eye Quick Fix
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Red eye removal tool. Make a selection around the eyes and run the plugin. Found in Tanel's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Red Ochre Plugin Pack 10 (PDN4)
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Compilation pack of Red Ochre's plugins. Features Aardvark, ArtyThing, Alpha-threshold, Object Bevel, Bezncurve, ClipDisplace, Cobweb, CompoGrids, Composition Tool, Contour, Cuboids, Dryad, Earths and Greys, Facet, Flourish, FurBlur, Gears, Gossamer, Gradients Galore!, Helix, Highlight, MultiSpline, New Clipwarp, Noise Choice, Object2colour, Object Edges, Overblur, Poster, Psychocolour, Recolor Choice, Selection2Clear, Scintillate, Scribble, Slinky, Squirkle, Squirkle Warp, StringandPin, CalliColour, Table, Two Tone Threshold, Vanishing Point.

plugin_index.title: Red Ochre's Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Alpha Threshold, Composition Tool, Contour, Earths&Greys, Gradients Galore, Highlight, Noisechoice, Object2color, Object edge, Overblur, Psychocolor, Recolor choice, Selection2clear, Squirkle, Squirklewarp, Tweak edges & Table.

plugin_index.title: Reduce Noise
plugin_index.author: Tom Jackson
plugin_index.desc: Reduces the noise in an image while maintaining detail. Included in paint.net v3.22+

plugin_index.title: Reflection - effect
plugin_index.author: dS810
plugin_index.desc: Create mirror/water type reflections of an existing image.

plugin_index.title: Refocus Filter v1.0
plugin_index.author: alexb
plugin_index.desc: Sharpens a blurred image using algorithm with deconvolution element.

plugin_index.title: Regular Noise Texture
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: A texturing plugin which creates patterns using pseudo random noise. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Remove Dust
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Removes photographic dust by minutely clone-stamping them out.

plugin_index.title: Render Color Wheel
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Draws a HSV color wheel, centred in the current selection.

plugin_index.title: Render Sphere Height Map
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Renders a configurable 24-bit height map for a sphere.

plugin_index.title: Resource translator v1.0 BETA
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Obsolete. Designed to aid development of paint.net language packs. Replaced by Strings.resx by paint.net developer Rick Brewster

plugin_index.title: Reticulation effect
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Creates a pseudo-reticulation effect (in film photography reticulation is wrinkling, cracking the emulsion layer of film). Options include Size, Density, Blending mode and transparency options. Also available in Russian.

plugin_index.title: Reverse Colors
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Selectively reverse the values of any of the RGBA channels. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: RGB Remapper
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Allows the remapping of RGB channels to other colours. Found in Stu's Effects.

plugin_index.title: RGB to CMYK
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Conversion between RGB (RedGreenBlue) and CMYK (CyanMagentaYellowblacK) color formats.

plugin_index.title: RGB565 Filetype
plugin_index.author: ejohnson0547
plugin_index.desc: Read and write to the RGB565 or RAW565 format. Used for Android splash screens.

plugin_index.title: Ripple
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Applies a regular ripple distortion across the image surface. Wavelet size, shape and magnitude are all configurable. Similar to Wobble. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Rosaces
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Generate simple or complex 'roses' (symmetrical patterns like a mathematical representation of a rose/flower). Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Rotate Text
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Write text to the canvas at an angle. The dll named RotateTextSUI.dll is enhanced for larger displays. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Rotate Zoom+
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Zoom & rotate a selection or layer with different resampling algorithms. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Rotation Bilinear v1.1
plugin_index.author: alexb
plugin_index.desc: Precision rotation of selection using bilinear algorithm.

plugin_index.title: Rounded Rectangle
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Render a rectangle with customizable curvature in the corners. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: Rounded Rectangle v1.2.0.0
plugin_index.author: Tim!
plugin_index.desc: Uses the Primary and Secondary colours and the current brush width to draw a rectangle with rounded corners into the current selection. Found in Tim's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Rubber Stamp
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Transforms an existing image to look like it was created with a rubber stamp.

plugin_index.title: Ruler
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Renders a ruler using the specified units & sub units. This will NOT measure anything and will NOT convert pixel length to another unit of length.

plugin_index.title: Sabrown100 Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Superseded by later release: see Simon Brown's Plugin Pack. Forum thread no longer exists.

plugin_index.title: Saturation RGB
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Separately adjust the saturation of the red, green and blue color channels.

plugin_index.title: Saturation to Alpha (formerly Switch Color to Alpha)
plugin_index.author: Joshua Lamusga
plugin_index.desc: Sets the transparency of each pixel equal to the intensity of it's color. In other words it overwrites the alpha channel with the saturation value. It makes colors with less saturation more transparent (and vice versa).

plugin_index.title: Scintillate
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Alternately inverts the colours of an image in a tiltable pattern. At small scale the result is a migraine inducing tiled moire style pattern. Slightly larger scales mimics a half-tone effect.

plugin_index.title: Scratch Art
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Mimics scratching lines through black paint overlaying colored paper.

plugin_index.title: Screen Pixel
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: An update of Bleek II's ScreenPixel plugin. Use it to breaks an image into it's constituent RGB components. For a pdn 3.5 compatible version see post #3 in the thread.

plugin_index.title: ScreenPixel
plugin_index.author: Bleek II
plugin_index.desc: Takes a (preferably pixelated) image and breaks the blocks into RGB components.

plugin_index.title: Scribble
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Change a photographic image to look like a hand drawn picture. Many presets including; coloured pencil drawing, graphite pencil, cross-hatched ink and scratchboard. Also the ability to save your settings.

plugin_index.title: ScriptLab v2.4
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Create compilations of other paint.net effects, adjustments, and plugins. You can save, load, and share your scripts. Includes Batch Processor. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Seamless Move
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Helps create seamless images. Somewhat similar to Seamless Texture Maker

plugin_index.title: Seamless Texture Helper
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Makes a given image seamlessly repeatable. Largely replaced by Seamless Texture Maker

plugin_index.title: Seamless Texture Maker
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: An updated version of BoltBait's Seamless Texture Helper. Create textures with no apparent edge when tiled. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Segment Image
plugin_index.author: Neil Cassidy
plugin_index.desc: Analyzes image and groups pixels that are relatively close together in the image and have roughly the same color.

plugin_index.title: Seismograph
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Transform an image into a colored line representation. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Selection Obscurer
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Remove dust/spots/freckles/moles/left over food/extra limbs/etc.. This is a little like small scale seam carving. Found in Stu's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Selection Tools
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Mini pack of tool for working on a selection. Effects are Feather (fade edges), Bevel (add shadow/highlights), Outline and Blur. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Selection2clear
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Makes the selection transparent, whilst leaving the selection active. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: SelectionInnerContour
plugin_index.author: HorridoJoho
plugin_index.desc: Applies an inner contour to a selection using the primary color. Similar to BoltBait's Selection Outline plugin, but faster.

plugin_index.title: Selective Enhancement v1.1
plugin_index.author: HiPhiSch
plugin_index.desc: Spread out or push together colors close to the selected one.

plugin_index.title: Selective Palette
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Build up a list of colours, then convert each pixel in the image to the closest colour in the list. Lists can be saved and loaded as paint.net Palette files. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: Selective Toning v1.0
plugin_index.author: HiPhiSch
plugin_index.desc: Apply toning corrections. With blending mode selector and alpha channel support. Similar to Advanced Color Replacement.

plugin_index.title: Self-Negation
plugin_index.author: Xhin
plugin_index.desc: Does the equivalent of taking a selection, adding it to another layer, setting the layer mode to 'Negation' and flattening it.

plugin_index.title: Sepia 2
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Apply a sepia filer to an image. Configurable intensity. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: ShadiSearch
plugin_index.author: doverdemon77
plugin_index.desc: Diagnose the Shade, Transparency and Saturation of an image or selection by recoloring using the Primary color.

plugin_index.title: Shadow / Highlight Recovery
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Fix excessively contrasted photos, by brightening shadows and/or darkening highlights. Found in Tanel's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Shadow effect
plugin_index.author: ryanr23
plugin_index.desc: Generates shadows with angle and transparency options. Like Google Map. Recompiled by Midora to work with paint.net 4.x.

plugin_index.title: Shape(ray, arrow, circle, etc)
plugin_index.author: myxlplyx
plugin_index.desc: Draw rays, arrows & circles with 'tv snow' effect (similar to chalk drawing) added to the shapes.

plugin_index.title: Shape3D
plugin_index.author: MKT
plugin_index.desc: Wrap your image around a 3D shape (with appropriate lighting).

plugin_index.title: Shaped Gradient v1.5
plugin_index.author: n d
plugin_index.desc: Creates a gradient in a multitude of shapes. Round, square, conical, linear and also elliptic, trapezoid, hexagonal & more

plugin_index.title: ShapeMaker v1.2.3
plugin_index.author: The Dwarf Horde
plugin_index.desc: New version has been released: see ShapeMaker 1.3+

plugin_index.title: ShapeMaker v1.3+
plugin_index.author: The Dwarf Horde
plugin_index.desc: ShapeMaker is a tool which uses a WYSIWYG interface to allow the creation of SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) Shapes, Lines and Curves. paint.net Shapes can be created and manipulated using just the mouse. Extensive documentation in two PDF files supplied in the download. The Dwarf Horde are [member=toe_head2001], [member=TechnoRobbo], [member=Red Ochre], [member=Ego Eram Reputo] and [member=BoltBait].

plugin_index.title: Shapes
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Render a repeating shape. User selects the increase/decrease step, speed, etc, Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Sharpen Landscape  (aka Landscape)
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Automates a number enhancements for landscape pictures. Also known as 'Sharpen Landscape'. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Sharpen+ (Advanced Unsharp Mask)
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Sharpen photos with an unsharp mask. Yields finer results than the built-in sharpen effect. Found in Tanel's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Shatters
plugin_index.author: black2hack
plugin_index.desc: Break up an image into fragments. Note Beta status. Similar to Mosaic

plugin_index.title: Sierpinski triangle
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Renders the Sierpinski triangle (an infinitely repeating pattern of equilateral triangles) to a selection or layer. Many options including colorization and zoom level. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Signature stamp
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Tool kit to create a personal signature stamp which can be applied to an image as an Effect. CodeLab source file and sample images provided, along with step by step instructions. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Silhoette Plugin v2.1
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Silhouettes images with partial transparency; turns the RGB to 000000 while preserving alpha. Silhouette(sp?)

plugin_index.title: Silhouette Plus
plugin_index.author: Mike Ryan
plugin_index.desc: Converts the entire canvas into your selected color while preserving the alpha levels of each pixel. Found in Mike Ryan's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Simon Brown's Legacy Pack
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: There is no forum thread for this plugin pack. Find it as a link in one of the effect threads. Effects: Alpha Mask Brush, Bullet, Channels, Conditional Pen, Create Image Map, Desktop Background Preview, FilmNoir, FindEdges, Fire, Flags, ImageShack Upload, JPEG Effect, PDN Watermark, Pixelated Frame, Stock Library, Subtle Effect, Texture, Transitional Brush. Filetypes: AviFile, AVIImport & SVGImport. Note: the file SBCommon.dll is required to be installed with these effects.

plugin_index.title: Simon Brown's Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Effects: CustomBrushesMini, ThatOtherApp, Printer+, Find Edges, Olden, Editable Text, Extend Border, DragFrom. Filetypes: Animated Image. Note: the file SBCommon.dll is required to be installed with these effects.

plugin_index.title: Simon B's plugin pack for 4.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Plugin Pack for 4.0x. Pack includes Effects: Custom BrushesMini, DragFrom, Editable Text, ExtendBorder, FindEdges, Olden, PrinterPlus, ThatOtherApp and Filetype: AnimGif.

plugin_index.title: Simple Lines Plugin
plugin_index.author: spongey437
plugin_index.desc: Draw vertical /horizontal lines across a selection.

plugin_index.title: Simplify
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Blur which simplifies the image by reducing color differences (and therefore fine detail). Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Simulate Color Depth
plugin_index.author: cookies
plugin_index.desc: Reduces the color depth of an image as if they had x bits of color data. Both monochrome and RGB options are included. Supporting files (dither folder) go in the /Documents/paint.net User Files/ folder.
plugin_index.dlls: SimulateColorDepth.dll plus a number of xml supporting files.

plugin_index.title: Sine Curves
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Use Equation in Curtis' Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Sine Wave Distort
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Uses sine function to apply a horizontal &/or vertical shift. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Single Hue
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Recolor an image to greyscale and a single color (hue). Hue and Saturation are configurable. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Slinky
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Render ellipses or circles along a line or curve... or in concentric circles. Named after the helical spring toy, this effect can be made to mimic.

plugin_index.title: Smart Blur
plugin_index.author: KrisVDM
plugin_index.desc: Similar to the built in Surface Blur. Found in Kris VDM's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Smart Sharpen
plugin_index.author: Pebal
plugin_index.desc: Dedicated to sharpening images after reduction size. Uses an adaptive algorithm, optimized for maximum reduction of halo effect.

plugin_index.title: Smooth
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: v4.0x version of Smooth - originally found in Toli's Effects plugin pack.

plugin_index.title: Smooth
plugin_index.author: Toli
plugin_index.desc: Selected area is smoothed internally, as if there were no surroundings. Found in Toli's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Smooth Noise
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: A noise generator which uses repeatable patterns and smoothing formula. Options to specify the cell size and pattern size as well as many other options. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Smudge v2.2
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Use custom brushes (*.png format) to smudge along the mouse path. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Soft Proofing
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Simulates how the current layer would look when printed with a specified color profile. The layer can then be exported as a JPEG or TIFF with the target color profile embedded.

plugin_index.title: Soft Saturation (aka Vibrance in 4.0x)
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Enhance or reduce the amount of color saturation. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5 (DLL contains numerous effects). Note: renamed Vibrance in 4.0x

plugin_index.title: Soften Edges
plugin_index.author: jchunn
plugin_index.desc: Detect 'rough' edges and softens them. Found in Jesse Chunn Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Soften Portrait
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Similar to the built in Soften Portrait effect only up to 40 times faster. Found in Ed Harvey's FastFx plugin pack.
plugin_index.dlls: EdHarvey.FastFx.dll, EdHarvey.FastFx.pdb and one of FastBlur_x64.dll or FastBlur_x86.dll

plugin_index.title: Solarize
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Reverses the hue of shadows and highlights. No configurable parameters. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Sound Wave
plugin_index.author: person_321
plugin_index.desc: Renders a wave pattern. Found in Person_321's Texture & Color Plugins

plugin_index.title: Spaced Text
plugin_index.author: simmetric
plugin_index.desc: Text rendering plugin which supports kerning & line spacing as well as a slew of basic word processing effects. Does not support OTF fonts. Jusitify option added 4 Aug 2017.

plugin_index.title: Sparkle Glitter
plugin_index.author: kshotts
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Generate glowing spheres, diamonds, and flares, with lots of parameters. Replaced by MadJiks Sparkle Effect

plugin_index.title: Sparkle Stars
plugin_index.author: kshotts
plugin_index.desc: Generate stars. Replaced by MadJiks Sparkle Effect. Appears broken in 4.0.5226.

plugin_index.title: Sparkles Effect
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Scans the image to find the bright highlights then adds some sparkle to them. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Speech Bubble
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Write speech bubbles and text directly to the canvas. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Spiral
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Simple spiral plugin. Use it to create/add spirals to your images. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Spiral Text ver 1.2
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Writes text on a spiral. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Spirit Level Photo Effect
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Rotate a layer using a virtual spirit level. Ideal for misaligned horizons in photos. Note: the rotation is limited to the range +/- 45. Many options to rescale or refit the image to the canvas.

plugin_index.title: SpiroGraph
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Draws alternated centred polygons and rotates/reduces each of them. Uses Primary & Secondary colors. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: SpiroShapes
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Draws repeating polygon shapes to create a more complex shape. Similar to spirograph. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Splashes
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Create filled or unfilled splashes (think unusual closed polygon shapes). Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Splatter v1.5
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Create paths similar to dripping paint. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Splinter
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Generates a number of rays (splinters) radiating outwards from the pixel. Number of splinters, length and rotation are configurable. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Spoked Wheel
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Creates a circular wheels with options to specify size, spoke number, axle size, rim thickness, color and more. CodeLab source provided. See post #12 of the thread for a paint.net 3.5.11 compatible version.

plugin_index.title: Sponge Effect
plugin_index.author: ReMake
plugin_index.desc: Simulates painting with a sponge. Options include Brush Size, Roughness and Intensity. Also available in Russian. Source available.

plugin_index.title: Spot the center
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Places a configurable marker at the center of the canvas, selection or weighted selection. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: SpriteSheet Animation v1.3
plugin_index.author: SeriousSam
plugin_index.desc: Test and design Sprite Sheets.

plugin_index.title: Spritesheet Export Plugin
plugin_index.author: MadDugan
plugin_index.desc: Saves a multilayered sprite sheet to a single layered file with the layers positioned side-by-side.

plugin_index.title: Squirkle
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Render 'squirkle' shapes from rounded lozenge through circle to square. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Squirkle Warp
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Magnifies and distorts 'squirkular' (square/circle) shapes. Found in Red Ochre's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Star Glow
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Use it to add some high lustre sparkle to your image. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Starry Sky
plugin_index.author: mcamp14
plugin_index.desc: Creates a starry sky (utilizes PixelLab). Renders a handful of stars on a black background. No configurable parameters.

plugin_index.title: Stars Effect
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Create polygon based multipoint stars. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Steganography
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Hide / show a second image in your original image. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Stencil
plugin_index.author: jchunn
plugin_index.desc: Convert an image (or selection) into a two color image similar to a stencil. Found in Jesse Chunn Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Stencil2Eye
plugin_index.author: doverdemon77
plugin_index.desc: Create a stencil (monotone) image based on the primary color.

plugin_index.title: Stewien Filters
plugin_index.author: John Stewien
plugin_index.desc: Apply one of five filters to your image. Filters are Dilate, Kuwahara Filter, Kuwahara Filter Modified, To Angle and Transparency By Color Subtraction.

plugin_index.title: StickMan
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: A plugin which helps position & pose predefined stick figures using a simple click-n-drag interface. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Stipple
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: Replaces an image with a 'dotted' version (circles with density depending on the image brightness).

plugin_index.title: Stitch
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Distorts base image with a 'splintered' appearance. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: StockLibrary1.5
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Manage your stock images from within paint.net. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Stray Pixel Remover
plugin_index.author: archip
plugin_index.desc: Removes pixels which are surrounded by transparent pixels. More poetically, it removes opaque islands in a sea of transparency. 4.0 version recompiled by toe_head2001.

plugin_index.title: StringAndPin
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Mimics String Art (aka Nail and Yarn) by stringing colored lines evenly between three fixed points to form abstract geometric patterns. Relocatable 'pin' points & many coloring options.

plugin_index.title: Stus Effects
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Selection Obscurer, Advanced Rotate, Alpha Contrast, Vignette, iPhone TabBar Icon Maker & RGB remapper.

plugin_index.title: SubLCD
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: This is a usability update of xrl's original SubLCD resize plugin (LCD Subsampling resize), which is 'useful if you want to display your images in a LCD/Plasma screen as it gives the appearance of a little more resolution.'

plugin_index.title: SubtleEffect
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Allows you to select a plugin and independently adjust the opacity that the effect will hold over the original image. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Subtract Color
plugin_index.author: davidf
plugin_index.desc: An easy to use color remover (i.e. color-to-alpha).

plugin_index.title: SVG Filetype
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Imports SVG and SVGZ files (Scalable Vector Graphics) and renders them as paint.net layers.
plugin_index.dlls: ImSVG.Open.FileType.dll & ImSVG.Open.FileType.dlc (/FileTypes).  OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dll  & OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dlc (paint.net installation folder)

plugin_index.title: SVGImport
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Adds support for SVG files. Files will be rasterized by the conversion process. Note: requires InkScape be installed.

plugin_index.title: Switch Alpha to Gray
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Converts the image to shades of gray based on the alpha value of each pixel. Useful for making masks. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Switch Gray to Alpha
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Deletes white/black from and image (leaving transparent pixels). Converts all other pixels to black. Useful for isolating line art. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Table
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Renders tables and grids. Only found in Red Ochre's plugin pack.

plugin_index.title: Take screen shots and paint it in paint.net
plugin_index.author: pamkkkkk
plugin_index.desc: Screen shot utility to take screen images and send them to paint.net.

plugin_index.title: Tanel's Photo and Color Plugins
plugin_index.author: Tanel
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Sharpen+, Shadow/highlight recovery, Local contrast enhancement, Color to alpha, Color mixer, Red eye quick fix, Basic photo adjustments, Black & White Converter, Eyeshine (animal red-eye) removal, Grain noise, Alpha blur v2, Bidirectional Blur.

plugin_index.title: Target Panel
plugin_index.author: rwp80
plugin_index.desc: Target Panel v1.0 advanced color manipulator. Found in Color Target Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Tartan
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Build and render custom tartan/plaid patterns.

plugin_index.title: Tattersall
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Generates a Tattersall pattern with custom colors, line width, spacing, and line style.

plugin_index.title: TechnoRobbo's Plugin Pak
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: TechnoRobbo's Plugin Pak. Contains: TR's Displacement Map, TR's ZigZag, TR's Tesla Coil, TR's Star Filter, TR's Scatter, TR's Cloud Control, Tessellation Combo, Noise Bleacher, Line Tracer, Layer Cake, Full Spectrum Posterizer, Fish Eye, Distort This!, CMY Ghost, Cycle HSV, TR's Halftone, TR's Colorizer HMS, TR's Tiled Pixels, TR's Edge Fader Extreme (EFX), TR's Pixel Sharpener, TR's B&W Photo, TR's Bokeh, TR's Pixel Pusher, TR's Tilt Shift, TR's Contour Filler, TR's Coquin Graduated Filter, TR's Strobe Motion, TR's Str8Edge Tool, TR's Film Stock, TR's Alpha Cutter, TR's Smudger, TR's Pixel Puller, TR's DoodleMatic, TR's FreeWarp, TR's SplineMaster, TR's PseudoSnap.

plugin_index.title: Temperature / Tint Adjustment
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Adjusts photos to tune the image temperature (blue through orange) and tinting (green through magenta).

plugin_index.title: Tessellation Combo
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A pair of plugins to offset an object then tile it from the clipboard.

plugin_index.title: Tesserae v1.0
plugin_index.author: NomBot
plugin_index.desc: A mosaic effect which uses path brushes to apply a tiled texture to an existing image.

plugin_index.title: Text Pro (free trial)
plugin_index.author: romein
plugin_index.desc: Impressive Word Art package for paint.net. Registration is required to remove watermark protection.

plugin_index.title: Text Steganography BETA
plugin_index.author: I Like Pi
plugin_index.desc: Encodes hidden text within an image. The plugin is also needed to view the text. Note: Beta status.

plugin_index.title: Text Window
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Renders a string of text to the layer or selection. String can be repeated, offset & a specific font specified. For PDN 3.5 version see post #21 in the thread.

plugin_index.title: Text+
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Render text specifying line spacing, location, direction, color and font pitch. Useful for when you need precise placement of text.

plugin_index.title: Texture
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Add a custom texture to the image on the canvas. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Texture Merger
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Combines two height maps, one on the canvas and the other in the clipboard. Each height map consists of an 8-bit alpha channel and a 24-bit depth, formed by combining the RGB channels into a single 24-bit unsigned integer.

plugin_index.title: Texture Object Rounder
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Converts objects to rounded height maps.For the most common case of an object that's symmetric about the vertical axis, it produces a height map for the object of rotation. For example, it will convert a filled circle to a spherical height map, a filled isosceles triangle to a conical height map, and a filled rectangle to a cylindrical height map.

plugin_index.title: Texture Scaler
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Utility to rescale height maps.

plugin_index.title: Texture Shader
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Uses the current layer as a height map to texture an image held in the clipboard. The clipboard image will appear to have shading and displacement applied as defined by the black and white height map. For 3.5.11 compatible version see post #20.

plugin_index.title: Texture Smoother
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Attempts to smooth black-and-white height maps into 24-bit height maps using 'Laplacian smoothing', which amounts to repeatedly replacing each depth with a weighted average of the depths in the immediate neighborhood.

plugin_index.title: Texturize effect
plugin_index.author: MichaelVinther
plugin_index.desc: Add a texture to a photo or image by changing the pixels brightness (based on the gradient of the texture).

plugin_index.title: That other app v1.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Adds an item to the tools menu which allows you to shell out to another application (GIMP, Photoshop, etc..,) to edit the current layer. On Save & Close the changes will appear in paint.net.

plugin_index.title: Thermal Heat Map
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Create a thermal representation of an image where brightness becomes 'heat' and dimness becomes 'cool'.

plugin_index.title: Threshold
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Converts a range of colors to black and white based on the user set threshold. Color channel is selectable as are the minima and maxima. Found in Ed Harvey Effects v3.5

plugin_index.title: Threshold
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: The threshold effect will change all pixels over the specified number to white, and the rest black. This version is obsolete, use Ed Harvey's version in Ed Harvey Effects

plugin_index.title: Tile Fill From Clipboard
plugin_index.author: dan9298
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Fills the current image with a tiled version of another image (held in the clipboard).

plugin_index.title: Tile Image
plugin_index.author: Curtis
plugin_index.desc: Tiles the image a number of times in each direction. Has the ability to flip every 2nd image to make the edges line up. Found in Curtis' Plugin Pack. Three DLL's contain a number of effects.

plugin_index.title: Tiles Reflection XY
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Enhanced version of 'Tiles Reflection' from paint.net v3.1. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: TileWorld
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Uses a point & click interface to tiles square regions of a loaded image onto the active layer. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Tim's Effects
plugin_index.author: Tim!
plugin_index.desc: Contains: Rounded Rectangle v1.2 & Mosaic Effect v1.0.

plugin_index.title: Tint Splinter
plugin_index.author: Xhin
plugin_index.desc: Recolor an image by simultaneously tinting it with two different colors. Can take an RGB channel and shift it to another, for example shift green to red.

plugin_index.title: TinyPNG
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Save filetype plugin that uses the TinyPNG service to compress images. TinyPNG is a lossy compression system which maintains transparency and most visual quality. Note: An active internet connect is required. The plugin will send your image to a third party service (TinyPNG), and download the compressed version. You should read TinyPNG's Terms of Service, and you need to sign up for your own API key.

plugin_index.title: toe_head2001's Plugin Pack
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Adjustments: SubLCD. Effects: Gaussian Blur (Clamped), Screen Pixel, Blur Fill, Inset Box Shadow, Barcode, Bulletin Board Trim,Coordinate Plane Points, Gingham, Isometric Cuboid, Jigsaw Puzzle, Pie Chart, Postage Stamp, Ruler, Spoked Wheel, Tartan, Tattersall, Two-point Perspective, Radius Corners & Text Window. Available as stand-alone dll's or can be installed with custom exe installer.

plugin_index.title: Toggle Alpha Channel
plugin_index.author: wbeard52
plugin_index.desc: Modify the alpha channel by resetting the Alpha value (subtracting the alpha channel value from 255). CodeLab source code included.

plugin_index.title: Toli's Effects
plugin_index.author: Toli
plugin_index.desc: Effects: Mirror/Rotate, Mirror / Rotate Menu, Engrave/Emboss, Smooth. All effects require IniFile.dll be present in /Effects/ folder. Language files are also available as part of the package.

plugin_index.title: Toli's Effects for v4.0
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Null54 has recompiled 'Toli's Effects v2.0.2' pack in to be compatible with paint.net 4.0. Effects: Mirror/Rotate, Mirror / Rotate Menu, Engrave/Emboss, Smooth. All effects require IniFile.dll be present in /Effects/ folder.

plugin_index.title: Tom's Palette Format
plugin_index.author: EzArik
plugin_index.desc: Load and save Tom's palette format (Palettes data is displayed on odd lines in rows of 32, the next line contains the previous lines Quantise information)

plugin_index.title: Tone Gradient Angle
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Reinterprets the tone gradient as a height map with directional lighting. Various emboss type effects and coloring options.

plugin_index.title: Tone Gradient Magnitude
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Reinterprets the magnitude of the tone gradient to create various outline effects. In other words it creates an outline in proportion to the change in tone.

plugin_index.title: Toon Filter
plugin_index.author: ownage
plugin_index.desc: Extracts pencil / line type drawing from an image (based on edge detection).

plugin_index.title: Toon Shader
plugin_index.author: Smoke_Dev420
plugin_index.desc: Simplifies image colors using code based on DirectX toon shaders.

plugin_index.title: Tournesol (Sun flower seeds)
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates spiraling strings of seeds or beads in vivid color. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Trail
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Echos' an object on an otherwise transparent layer, so that it appears to have a 'trail'. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: Trail 3d
plugin_index.author: n d
plugin_index.desc: Creates a shaped gradient 'trail' from the object towards a configurable destination point. Gradient color is editable.

plugin_index.title: Trail Blur
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Create a straight or curved blurred trail. Similar to Motion Blur with additional curve and fade out options.

plugin_index.title: TransitionalBrush
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Allows users to select two colours and have a brush that gradually changes colour between them. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Transparency Adjustment Effect
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Adjust the opacity of a selection independent of the entire layer. Found in BoltBait's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Transparent to Transparent Black
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Changes all pixels with an Alpha value of zero to transparent black (RGBA 0, 0, 0, 0 or #00000000).

plugin_index.title: TreeGen
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Generates tree-type trunks and branches. For a more realistic effect, see the GenTree effect. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Triangular Gradient
plugin_index.author: Enormator
plugin_index.desc: Makes a triangular gradient in selection (or on the full image when nothing is selected) from primary to secondary color (including alpha).

plugin_index.title: Trippy Rainbow
plugin_index.author: pavlik1307
plugin_index.desc: Converts pixel brightness to a shade on a rainbow spectrum. The effect is much like the color cycling when adjusting only the Hue slider in Hue/Saturation

plugin_index.title: TR's Alpha Cutter
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Set up to 512 points around an object to define a mask.

plugin_index.title: TR's Alpha Mapper
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Graphically adjust how brightness translates to transparency. Useful for blending images.

plugin_index.title: TR's B&W Photo
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Simulates the use of color filters and hot spots in B&W photography.

plugin_index.title: TR's Bokeh
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A classic photographic effect of multicolored diffuse circles overlaid over the image. Almost like blurred Christmas lights.

plugin_index.title: TR's Brush Strokes
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Redraws the contents of the layer/selection with simulated brush strokes. Options: Texture, Stroke Width, Stoke Direction, Bristles.

plugin_index.title: TR's Cloud Control
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Renders configurable clouds to the layer or selection.

plugin_index.title: TR's Color Reducer and palette maker
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Reduce the number of colors (n) in an image. Useful to reduce file sizes. Editable color table if n<1000 and ability to save as a palette if n<97.

plugin_index.title: TR's Color Wave
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Finds the borders between colors (not shades) and allows the user to interpret 'ripples' as they fan out in waves from the epicenter.

plugin_index.title: TR's Colorizer HMS
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Smoothly adjust the image colorization between three color ranges (highlights, midtones & shadow).

plugin_index.title: TR's Contour Filler
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Gradient fill effect which conforms to the contour of the Alpha Channel.

plugin_index.title: TR's Coquin Graduated Filter
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Apply Jean Coquin's graduated filter. A simulation of the 1970's photographic effect.

plugin_index.title: TR's Croquis
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A French word, croquis means 'sketch'. The plugin mimics a quick pencil sketch of the contents of the selection or layer.

plugin_index.title: TR's Custom Palette Matcher
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Remaps the image colors to conform to a custom (paint.net) palette by finding the nearest color match.

plugin_index.title: TR's Custom Shape Filler
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Fills the layer or selection with multiple copies of a specified png in varying sizes and rotation.

plugin_index.title: TR's Displacement Map
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Enlargement/distortion effect.

plugin_index.title: TR's Distort This!
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Replaced by Distort This! v2.8 by toe_head2001.

plugin_index.title: TR's Dodge and Burn
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A photo retouching tool which allows the application of effects via custom brushes. Effects included: Dodge, Burn, blur, sharpen, saturate, desaturate, contrast, rotate hue, color blend & luminosity. Many other photography type options.

plugin_index.title: TR's DoodleMatic
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Edge detection effect which turns artwork into a pencil type sketch.

plugin_index.title: TR's DrumSkin
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Re-maps rectangular images to circular.

plugin_index.title: TR's Edge Fader Extreme
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Fade the hard edge of an object. Like feathering, only stronger. Now called TR's EFX and located in the Object menu.

plugin_index.title: TR's Export Selection
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Exports any selection from the active layer (including irregular shaped selections). Exports to the PNG format.

plugin_index.title: TR's Filaments
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A simulation of time lapse of writing with light. You place the nodes and the plugin draws fine filaments in a continuous curve through all the nodes. Many options to control filaments and colors.

plugin_index.title: TR's Film Stock
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Mimics photographic film speed (ISO) by reinterpreting the contrast in an image without losing the dynamic range.

plugin_index.title: TR's FilmStrip
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Creates a proof sheet style image from a series of video grabs. Number of columns in the finished compilation is configurable. Note that the two support files are essential.
plugin_index.dlls: TRsFilmStripPlgIn.dll, AxInterop.WMPLib.dll and Interop.WMPLib.dll (all to /Effects folder).

plugin_index.title: TR's FireWorks
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Create star bursts and skyrocket type explosions.

plugin_index.title: TR's FreeWarp
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Distortion tool which reshapes an image by stretching its detail.

plugin_index.title: TR's Fuego
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A parametric fire simulator (creates realistic flames for the Pyrochild in all of us).

plugin_index.title: TR's Glass Vignette
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A Refraction-like distortion with an un-distorted center. In other words - it distorts the image as if it were viewed through curved glass. Shiny!

plugin_index.title: TR's Halftone
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Simulate Halftone printing (technique used in newspapers and magazines) by interpreting color depth as a Dot or Square.

plugin_index.title: TR's HDR-ish
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Mimics HDR style images by smoothing out the transitions between light and dark, making a dull picture less dull

plugin_index.title: TR's Intense Filtration
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Color filter and color augmenter, with options to set the hue, gain, intensity and also to fade in the changes.

plugin_index.title: TR's Intensity Warp
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Re-map pixels within an image by the intensity. Supports textures, gradients and custom textures. Some very nice metallic sheens are possible.

plugin_index.title: TR's iPollock
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Abstract art generator inspired by the works of Jackson Pollock (think: paint drips, dribbles and splashes).

plugin_index.title: TR's Kaboom
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Scatter or disperse an image outward from a central point using alpha transparency. Similar to a 360 degree version of Scatter.

plugin_index.title: TR's KeyFrame
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: An animation tool. Create a path for an object then generate frames to animate the image as if it were moving along the path.

plugin_index.title: TR's KlumpNoiz
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Groups generated 'noise' together in clumps to create colorful, vaguely fractal patterns.

plugin_index.title: TR's Monolithic (3D Text Generator)
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Creates monolithic (slab-like) text using an installed font as a base. Think word-art for paint.net. Many options include a range of color options, lighting, pitch, yaw and roll, size, zoom, etc...

plugin_index.title: TR's Morpher
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Morph one image into another using a control grid to define 'like' areas. Once defined, generates the between images. Also creates warps (self morphs). Outputs a number of successively numbered images for animating.

plugin_index.title: TR's PanoPDN Panoramic Viewer
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Converts equirectangular images (think: spherical images or spherical projections) into a texture map and renders them in direct3d.

plugin_index.title: TR's Paste Frame
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Custom frame maker which uses a clipboard image to create a frame.

plugin_index.title: TR's Paste Warp
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Warps an image contained in the clipboard to fill any active selection.

plugin_index.title: TR's Pixel Puller
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Pull the image around to emphasize or de-emphasize perspective. Companion plugin to TR's Pixel Pusher.

plugin_index.title: TR's Pixel Pusher
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Distort images via stretching and squashing in a manner mimicking a fairground mirror.

plugin_index.title: TR's Pixel Sharpener
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Sharpen photos by emphasising detail and adding noise type texture.

plugin_index.title: TR's Plasmatics
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Recreate the 80's with this old fashioned Plasma Effect. Cool man, cool.

plugin_index.title: TR's Portrait Retoucher
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Reduce photo blemishes, wrinkles and lines by smoothing out the subject.

plugin_index.title: TR's PseudoSnap
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Align an object (must be on a transparent layer) within a configurable grid. In other words it makes the object snap-to-grid

plugin_index.title: TR's Quick Outliner
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Outline and/or fill a selection with colors from the color wheels. Outline thickness and softness options.

plugin_index.title: TR's Radial Extruder
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Takes the base image and repeats it in radial slices emanating from a common center point. Think of a circular cake that has been sliced from the center many times. Source available.

plugin_index.title: TR's Reverse Fisheye
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Removes or reduces fisheye distortion to reproduce the original panoramic image. Options to use different algorithms, Linear or Circular.

plugin_index.title: TR's Scatter
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Neat effect which simulates the image being eroded into individual pixels by a strong wind.

plugin_index.title: TR's SelfEeZ
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Captures an image directly from a webcam and imports it into the current layer.

plugin_index.title: TR's Smudger
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Smudge, smear and blend colors in the layer. Requires that you hold the CTRL key to smudge.

plugin_index.title: TR's Snow Flake Maker
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Generates iterative fractal-like snow flakes.

plugin_index.title: TR's SphereCuber
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Converts a Spherical View image into a cube-map of six files representing Up, Down, Left, Right, Front & Back views.

plugin_index.title: TR's SplineMaster
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Draw free-form Splines (complex curves through positioning nodes). Draw on an existing image, an empty layer or using an image as a guide. Numerous line types and end cap styles. Later release adds the ability to load, save and edit splines.

plugin_index.title: TR's Star Filter
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Adds sparkle or glitter to image highlights. Similar to MadJik's Star Glow

plugin_index.title: TR's Str8Edge Tool
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Smoothes out jagged edges on a Cut-Out.

plugin_index.title: TR's Strange Attractors
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A fractal generator which uses chaos theory to pump out the fractals known as Strange Attractors - think: wavy line patterns.

plugin_index.title: TR's Strobe Motion
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Simulates a stop-motion effect as if continuous motion was captured in a series of images as illuminated by a strobe light.

plugin_index.title: TR's Tesla Coil
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Simulates an electrical arc with configurable start and end points, thickness, intensity and more.

plugin_index.title: TR's Third Dimension
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Turn 2D Images into 3D Images and Terrains where brightness becomes the apparent height (the Third Dimension).

plugin_index.title: TR's Tiled Pixels
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Pixelate an image or selection and simultaneously apply a shape to the enlarged pixels.

plugin_index.title: TR's Tilt Shift
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: A directional gradient blur tool designed to easily achieve an apparent change in the field of view.

plugin_index.title: TR's TreeMaker
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Creates a variety of organic, tree-like branching patterns with realistic leaves.

plugin_index.title: TR's ZigZag
plugin_index.author: TechnoRobbo
plugin_index.desc: Apply waves, ripples, zigzags and vibrato type distortions.

plugin_index.title: True Blur
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Subtle blurring effect which allows much finer control than other blurs. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Truncate Resolution
plugin_index.author: Joshua Lamusga
