plugin_index.desc: Simulates resolution loss by taking the values of each color channel (and optionally the transparency channel) and snapping them to multiples of the given number. An image with 8 as a number converts each color channel value to a multiple of 8.

plugin_index.title: Tube Effect (aka tube oblique?)
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Distort an image as if you wrapped it around a cylinder. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Turbulent.Effects
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Two plugins to render lines and circles combined with turbulence. Turbulent Circles: Renders concentric circles ranging from smooth to wavy (creates textures like smoke rings, lava, flower petals, etc,). Turbulent Lines: Render lines combined with turbulence with results ranging from smooth lines to chaotic waves (creates textures like waves, horizons, marble, wood grain, smoke, etc,).

plugin_index.title: Twainable
plugin_index.author: NisseBosseLasse
plugin_index.desc: Add TWAIN support for scanners. Should be compatible with all scanners that are TWAIN compliant. Place both Twainable.dll and EZTW32.dll in the /Effects/ folder.

plugin_index.title: Twainable+
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Allows paint.net to use 32-bit TWAIN drivers on a 64-bit OS. Place both files in the /Effects/ folder.

plugin_index.title: Tweak edges
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Detects abrupt changes in tone and produces outlines from these tonal changes.

plugin_index.title: Tweak Transparency
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Thicken outlines, set transparency minima & maxima, bevels & shadow/halo effects

plugin_index.title: Twist
plugin_index.author: pyrochild
plugin_index.desc: Twist a portion of an image. Configurable size & many other parameters. Found in Pyrochild's Plugins

plugin_index.title: TwistZ
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Transform an image by applying a spiral twist. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Two Tone Threshold
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Assesses the tones in an image and apportions two colours between the thresholds.

plugin_index.title: Two-point Perspective
plugin_index.author: toe_head2001
plugin_index.desc: Generates a Rectangular Cuboid and shows it using two-point (vanishing point) projection

plugin_index.title: UnAlpha
plugin_index.author: doverdemon77
plugin_index.desc: Highlight fully or partially transparent pixels with the Primary Color, or replace them with different Alpha values.

plugin_index.title: Unblend
plugin_index.author: ArgusMagnus
plugin_index.desc: Reverses 'Normal' blending using a selection and a specified color (Primary, Average or Dominant color) to create a new image. Each pixel has the minimum Alpha value which recreates the original image under 'normal' blending with the specified color.

plugin_index.title: Unblend
plugin_index.author: Legorol
plugin_index.desc: Removes a chosen color from the image and replaces it with transparency. In other words, it performs the reverse of a normal blend operation with the chosen color.

plugin_index.title: Unselected Rectangle Keeper
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Erases the background surrounding an unselected region, but keeps the rectangular area which minimally bounds the unselected area. NB: no user interface. 3.5.11 version supplied by Maximilian (found in the third post of the thread).

plugin_index.title: Unsharp Mask
plugin_index.author: romein
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Corrects blurring introduced during photographing, scanning, resampling, or printing.

plugin_index.title: Upload to... V2.0
plugin_index.author: Simon Brown
plugin_index.desc: Upload images direct to the internet from within paint.net. Requires resource file SBCommon.dll to reside in the Effects directory. Found in Simon Brown's Legacy Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Vanishing point
plugin_index.author: Red Ochre
plugin_index.desc: Renders a pair of triangles as an optical aid to determining the vanishing point in a composition.

plugin_index.title: Vantage Preview Images (.VBP)
plugin_index.author: mchansy
plugin_index.desc: Support for Vantage Sat Receiver Preview Images.

plugin_index.title: Varicose
plugin_index.author: jchunn
plugin_index.desc: Wibbly line creator. Found in Jesse Chunn Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: Varicose 2
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Create wibbly lines with this updated version of Jchunn's original Varicose plugin. More options and language support. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Vibration
plugin_index.author: AhmedElyamani
plugin_index.desc: Blurs then color bands an image. The result is somewhat similar to the appearance of oil on water. Found in Ahmed's Plugin Pack

plugin_index.title: Vibrato
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Generates colored moire rings within the colored parts of an image. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: View Framer
plugin_index.author: MJW
plugin_index.desc: Overlays a frame/guidelines to serve as a guides to further editing. Note: should be applied to a blank layer above the target image.

plugin_index.title: Vignette
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Apply a black vignette to the image. Size, shape and strength are all configurable. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Vignette+
plugin_index.author: BoltBait
plugin_index.desc: Enhanced vignette plugin. Adds a black, white or colored vignette. Softer than the built in effect.

plugin_index.title: Vignette1
plugin_index.author: sradforth
plugin_index.desc: Easy vignette creator. Options include power (strength of effect), X and Y axis configuration and transparency/coloring. Found in Stu's Effects.

plugin_index.title: Vignetting Filter
plugin_index.author: alexb
plugin_index.desc: Radial Vignetting Photo Filter. Due to the similarity to Ed Harvey's Vignette plugin, this plugin has been flagged obsolete and the thread removed from the forum.

plugin_index.title: Vitrious
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Expand or contract a range of colors by specifying the Hue and Amount of change. Think of this as a subtle recoloring effect. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Volutes
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Draws random curves. The curve is pre-calculated and then resized to fit in the image, so start and end points are at random positions. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: VTF Plug-In (1.0.4)
plugin_index.author: Nem
plugin_index.desc: VTF file support. File format used by the Source engine (Half-Life 2 etc.).
plugin_index.dlls: VtfFileType.dll and one of VTFLib.x64.dll or VTFLib.x86.dll

plugin_index.title: Water Reflection
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Render a reflection as if your image was reflected in water. Updated. See Found in Wet Floor Reflection. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Wave Text v1.0
plugin_index.author: dpy
plugin_index.desc: Writes a string of text along a sine curve. The dll named WaveTextSUI.dll is enhanced for larger displays. Found in dpy's Pack

plugin_index.title: Wavelet Haar 2-tap
plugin_index.author: hindol
plugin_index.desc: Performs a Haar 2-tap transformation of an image (quarters the image size makes three duplicates, performing different edge detection algorithms on each).

plugin_index.title: Waves
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Wave distortion effect. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: Weave
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Distort the image as if it was cut into strips and woven back together. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: WebP Filetype
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Load and save Google's WebP filetype. To install place all three dlls from the download in the FileTypes folder.
plugin_index.dlls: WebPFiletype.dll and one of WebP_x86.dll or WebP_x64.dll

plugin_index.title: Wet Floor Reflection
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Renders a reflection of an object as if it was standing on a wet floor. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: What's It?
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Identify files by looking for a specific signature in the file content. Can correct improperly assigned extensions.

plugin_index.title: WhichSymbol / WhichSymbolPlus
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Character & symbol browser/writer for installed fonts. Character is rendered using the Primary color. Found in EER's Plugin Pack.

plugin_index.title: White Balance
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Subtle recoloring effects. Specify Hue and Amount (strength) of the retinting. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Whitepoint Correction
plugin_index.author: Lord Crc
plugin_index.desc: Color correction, based off of a neutral point in the image.

plugin_index.title: Windows Imaging Component (WIC)
plugin_index.author: Rene Slijkhuis
plugin_index.desc: Adds reading support for all image formats supported by the Windows Imaging Component (WIC) codecs on your computer.

plugin_index.title: Windows Metafile FileType
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Imports Windows metafiles and renders them to paint.net bitmap layers. Supported types are WMF, EMF, EMF+, and the compressed variants WMZ and EMZ. There is a very basic implementation of export to EMF.
plugin_index.dlls: OptionBasedLibrary vX.X.dll/.dlc to the paint.net/ folder and ImEMF,WMF.FileType.dll/dlc' to the paint.net/FileTypes/ folder

plugin_index.title: WMF (Windows Metafile)
plugin_index.author: Bruce Bowyer-Smyth
plugin_index.desc: Opens WMF files as a raster image. NOTE: OPENS FILES ONLY - will not save the *.WMF format. To install place all three DLL files in the /Filetypes/ folder.

plugin_index.title: Wobble
plugin_index.author: Ed Harvey
plugin_index.desc: Applies a ripple distortion across the image surface. Wavelet size, shape and magnitude are all configurable. Similar to Ripple. Found in Ed Harvey Effectsv3.5. DLL contains numerous effects.

plugin_index.title: Woven Photo
plugin_index.author: Ego Eram Reputo
plugin_index.desc: Overlays edging and shadowing to make the source image look like it has been woven out of narrow strips.

plugin_index.title: WSQ file type
plugin_index.author: odalet
plugin_index.desc: Load and save WSQ files. The WSQ (Wavelet Scalar Quantization) algorithm is a compression algorithm used for gray-scale fingerprint images. Developed by the FBI.
plugin_index.dlls: Delta.Wsq.dll, PdnWsq.dll and one of nbis32.dll or nbis64.dll

plugin_index.title: X Rainbow bars
plugin_index.author: person_321
plugin_index.desc: Renders horizontal bars of rainbow hues. Found in Person_321's Texture & Color Plugins

plugin_index.title: XCF filetype
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Load and save images in GIMP native file format XCF (and its packed variants XCFGZ and XCFBZ2). To install, copy the two files into the /FileTypes/ folder.

plugin_index.title: XNB format
plugin_index.author: r2d2rigo
plugin_index.desc: Loads XNA 4 uncompressed Texture2D & XNBs compiled for Windows or Windows Phone. No save option. To install, copy all four DLL files to the /FileTypes/ folder.

plugin_index.title: XPM File Type plugin
plugin_index.author: naylorjs
plugin_index.desc: XPM support in paint.net. Note: doesn't handle every XPM option.

plugin_index.title: XY Coords
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Creates a grid with the text giving the position of the cell in this grid with X,Y coords. Useful to understand the transformation done by other distort effects. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack.

plugin_index.title: XY Coords
plugin_index.author: MadJik
plugin_index.desc: Originally a tool created to find out how a picture is distorted/transformed by over effects (useful with Shape 3D). The effect renders regularly spaced X,Y coordinate pairs to the canvas. Found in Magical Plugins Megapack

plugin_index.title: Zigzag ray (aka eShape_umabob)
plugin_index.author: myxlplyx
plugin_index.desc: Creates shapes/lines using scales. Appears in Effects menu as 'eShape_umabob' for some strange reason.

plugin_index.title: ZIP Archive FileType
plugin_index.author: Martin Osieka
plugin_index.desc: Loads/saves the contents of a paint.net document (layers and metadata) from/to a compressed ZIP Archive. Each layer becomes a separate file in the archive. Several formats for the layer files are supported: PNG, BMP, GIF, and JPEG. Additionally a thumbnail and a composite image can be stored in the archive.

plugin_index.title: Zoom Blur Deluxe
plugin_index.author: dake
plugin_index.desc: Incompatible with 4.0x. Improved zoom blur effect. Also known as Fast zoom blur.

plugin_index.title: Zoom Blur Deluxe for PDN4
plugin_index.author: null54
plugin_index.desc: Updated version of Zoom Blur Deluxe. The effect applies a blur which increases in magnitude as the distance increases away from the specified center point.
